Photuris: Session-Key Management Protocol
contents.zh-CHS: 会话密钥管理协议

contents.text: Status of this Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录的状况

contents.text: This document defines an Experimental Protocol for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard of any kind. Discussion and suggestions for improvement are requested. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档为互联网社区定义了一个实验协议。它没有规定任何类型的互联网标准。要求进行讨论并提出改进建议。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: Photuris is a session-key management protocol intended for use with the IP Security Protocols (AH and ESP). This document defines the basic protocol mechanisms.
contents.zh-CHS: Photuris是一种会话密钥管理协议，用于IP安全协议（AH和ESP）。本文档定义了基本的协议机制。

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text:
5.5       Privacy-Key Computation .........................   36

B.     Use of Identification and Secrets .....................   67

1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: Photuris [Firefly] establishes short-lived session-keys between two parties, without passing the session-keys across the Internet. These session-keys directly replace the long-lived secret-keys (such as passwords and passphrases) that have been historically configured for security purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: Photuris[Firefly]在双方之间建立短期会话密钥，而不通过Internet传递会话密钥。这些会话密钥直接替换长期使用的密钥（如密码和密码短语），这些密钥在历史上是出于安全目的配置的。

contents.text: The basic Photuris protocol utilizes these existing previously configured secret-keys for identification of the parties. This is intended to speed deployment and reduce administrative configuration changes.
contents.zh-CHS: 基本Photuris协议利用这些现有的先前配置的密钥来识别各方。这旨在加快部署并减少管理配置更改。

contents.text: This document is primarily intended for implementing the Photuris protocol. It does not detail service and application interface definitions, although it does mention some basic policy areas required for the proper implementation and operation of the protocol mechanisms.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件主要用于实施Photuris协议。它没有详细说明服务和应用程序接口定义，尽管它提到了正确实现和操作协议机制所需的一些基本策略领域。

contents.text: Since the basic Photuris protocol is extensible, new data types and protocol behaviour should be expected. The implementor is especially cautioned not to depend on values that appear in examples to be current or complete, since their purpose is primarily pedagogical.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于基本的Photuris协议是可扩展的，因此应预期新的数据类型和协议行为。特别提醒实施者不要依赖示例中出现的当前或完整的值，因为它们的目的主要是教学。

contents.text: 1.1. Terminology
In this document, the key words "MAY", "MUST, "MUST NOT", "optional", "recommended", "SHOULD", and "SHOULD NOT", are to be interpreted as described in [RFC-2119].
contents.zh-CHS: 在本文件中，关键词“可能”、“必须”、“不得”、“可选”、“建议”、“应该”和“不应该”应按照[RFC-2119]中所述进行解释。

contents.text: byte An 8-bit quantity; also known as "octet" in standardese.
contents.zh-CHS: 字节是8位的数量；在标准语中也称为“八位组”。

contents.text: exchange-value The publically distributable value used to calculate a shared-secret. As used in this document, refers to a Diffie-Hellman exchange, not the public part of a public/private key-pair.
contents.zh-CHS: 交换值用于计算共享机密的可公开分发的值。本文档中使用的是Diffie-Hellman交换，而不是公钥/私钥对的公共部分。

contents.text: private-key A value that is kept secret, and is part of an asymmetric public/private key-pair.
contents.zh-CHS: 私钥是保密的值，是非对称公钥/私钥对的一部分。

contents.text: public-key A publically distributable value that is part of an asymmetric public/private key-pair.
contents.zh-CHS: 公钥作为非对称公钥/私钥对的一部分的可公开分发的值。

contents.text: secret-key A symmetric key that is not publically distributable. As used in this document, this is distinguished from an asymmetric public/private
contents.zh-CHS: 秘密密钥不可公开分发的对称密钥。正如在本文件中所使用的，这与不对称的公共/私有模式不同

contents.text: key-pair. An example is a user password.
contents.zh-CHS: 钥匙对。例如，用户密码。

contents.text: Security Association (SA) A collection of parameters describing the security relationship between two nodes. These parameters include the identities of the parties, the transform (including algorithm and algorithm mode), the key(s) (such as a session-key, secret-key, or appropriate public/private key-pair), and possibly other information such as sensitivity labelling.
contents.zh-CHS: 安全关联（SA）描述两个节点之间安全关系的参数集合。这些参数包括各方的身份、转换（包括算法和算法模式）、密钥（例如会话密钥、秘密密钥或适当的公钥/私钥对），以及可能的其他信息，例如敏感度标签。

contents.text: Security Parameters Index (SPI) A number that indicates a particular set of uni-directional attributes used under a Security Association, such as transform(s) and session-key(s). The number is relative to the IP Destination, which is the SPI Owner, and is unique per IP (Next Header) Protocol. That is, the same value MAY be used by multiple protocols to concurrently indicate different Security Association parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: 安全参数索引（SPI）表示在安全关联下使用的一组特定单向属性的数字，如转换和会话密钥。该数字相对于IP目的地，即SPI所有者，并且每个IP（下一个标头）协议都是唯一的。也就是说，多个协议可以使用相同的值来同时指示不同的安全关联参数。

contents.text: session-key A key that is independently derived from a shared-secret by the parties, and used for keying one direction of traffic. This key is changed frequently.
contents.zh-CHS: 会话密钥一种密钥，由各方独立地从共享密钥中派生，用于为一个方向的通信量设置密钥。这把钥匙经常更换。

contents.text: shared-secret As used in this document, the calculated result of the Photuris exchange.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中使用的共享机密，即Photuris交换的计算结果。

contents.text: SPI Owner The party that corresponds to the IP Destination; the intended recipient of a protected datagram.
contents.zh-CHS: SPI所有者对应于IP目的地的一方；受保护数据报的预期接收者。

contents.text: SPI User The party that corresponds to the IP Source; the sender of a protected datagram.
contents.zh-CHS: SPI用户与IP源相对应的一方；受保护数据报的发送方。

contents.text: transform A cryptographic manipulation of a particular set of data. As used in this document, refers to certain well-specified methods (defined elsewhere). For example, AH-MD5 [RFC-1828] transforms an IP datagram into a cryptographic hash, and ESP-DES-CBC [RFC-1829] transforms plaintext to ciphertext and back again.
contents.zh-CHS: 转换对特定数据集的加密操作。如本文件所用，指某些明确规定的方法（在别处定义）。例如，AH-MD5[RFC-1828]将IP数据报转换为加密散列，ESP-DES-CBC[RFC-1829]将明文转换为密文，然后再转换回来。

contents.text: Many of these terms are hierarchically related:
contents.zh-CHS: 这些术语中有许多是层次相关的：

contents.text:
Security Association (bi-directional)
 - one or more lists of Security Parameters (uni-directional)
  -- one or more Attributes
   --- may have a key
   --- may indicate a transform
Implementors will find details of cryptographic hashing (such as MD5), encryption algorithms and modes (such as DES), digital signatures (such as DSS), and other algorithms in [Schneier95].
contents.zh-CHS: 实现者将在[Schneier95]中找到加密哈希（如MD5）、加密算法和模式（如DES）、数字签名（如DSS）和其他算法的详细信息。

contents.text: 1.2. Protocol Overview
contents.zh-CHS: 1.2. 协议概述

contents.text: The Photuris protocol consists of several simple phases:
contents.zh-CHS: Photuris协议由几个简单阶段组成：

contents.text: 1. A "Cookie" Exchange guards against simple flooding attacks sent with bogus IP Sources or UDP Ports. Each party passes a "cookie" to the other.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. “Cookie”交换可以防止使用伪造的IP源或UDP端口发送的简单洪泛攻击。每一方都将一块“饼干”传递给另一方。

contents.text: In return, a list of supported Exchange-Schemes are offered by the Responder for calculating a shared-secret.
contents.zh-CHS: 作为回报，响应者将提供一个支持的交换方案列表，用于计算共享密钥。

contents.text: 2. A Value Exchange establishes a shared-secret between the parties. Each party passes an Exchange-Value to the other. These values are used to calculate a shared-secret. The Responder remains stateless until a shared-secret has been created.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 价值交换在双方之间建立了一个共享的秘密。每一方将交换价值传递给另一方。这些值用于计算共享机密。在创建共享机密之前，响应程序将保持无状态。

contents.text: In addition, supported attributes are offered by each party for use in establishing new Security Parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，各方还提供支持的属性，用于建立新的安全参数。

contents.text: 3. An Identification Exchange identifies the parties to each other, and verifies the integrity of values sent in phases 1 and 2.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 身份交换将各方相互识别，并验证在第1阶段和第2阶段发送的值的完整性。

contents.text: In addition, the shared-secret provides a basis to generate separate session-keys in each direction, which are in turn used for conventional authentication or encryption. Additional security attributes are also exchanged as needed.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，共享密钥为在每个方向生成单独的会话密钥提供了基础，而会话密钥又用于传统的身份验证或加密。还可以根据需要交换其他安全属性。

contents.text: This exchange is masked for party privacy protection using a message privacy-key based on the shared-secret. This protects the identities of the parties, hides the Security Parameter attribute values, and improves security for the exchange protocol and security transforms.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用基于共享秘密的消息隐私密钥屏蔽此交换，以保护参与方隐私。这将保护各方的身份，隐藏安全参数属性值，并提高exchange协议和安全转换的安全性。

contents.text: 4. Additional messages may be exchanged to periodically change the session-keys, and to establish new or revised Security Parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 可交换附加消息以周期性地改变会话密钥，并建立新的或经修改的安全参数。

contents.text: These exchanges are also masked for party privacy protection in the same fashion as above.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了保护当事人隐私，这些交换也被屏蔽，方式与上述相同。

contents.text: The sequence of message types and their purposes are summarized in the diagram below. The first three phases (cookie, exchange, and identification) must be carried out in their entirety before any Security Association can be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 下图总结了消息类型的顺序及其用途。在使用任何安全关联之前，必须完整执行前三个阶段（cookie、交换和标识）。

contents.text:
Initiator                            Responder
=========                            =========
Cookie_Request                 ->
                                <-   Cookie_Response
                                        offer schemes
Value_Request                  ->
   pick scheme
   offer value
   offer attributes
                                <-   Value_Response
                                        offer value
                                        offer attributes
[generate shared-secret from exchanged values]
contents.zh-CHS: [从交换的值生成共享机密]

contents.text: Identity_Request -> make SPI pick SPI attribute(s) identify self authenticate make privacy key(s) mask/encrypt message <- Identity_Response make SPI pick SPI attribute(s) identify self authenticate make privacy key(s) mask/encrypt message
contents.zh-CHS: 标识请求->使SPI选择SPI属性标识自我验证使隐私密钥屏蔽/加密消息<-标识响应使SPI选择SPI属性标识自我验证使隐私密钥屏蔽/加密消息

contents.text: [make SPI session-keys in each direction]
contents.zh-CHS: [在每个方向制作SPI会话密钥]

contents.text:
SPI User                             SPI Owner
========                             =========
SPI_Needed                     ->
   list SPI attribute(s)
   make validity key
   authenticate
   make privacy key(s)
   mask/encrypt message
                                <-   SPI_Update
                                        make SPI
                                        pick SPI attribute(s)
                                        make SPI session-key(s)
                                        make validity key
                                        authenticate
                                        make privacy key(s)
                                        mask/encrypt message
Either party may initiate an exchange at any time. For example, the Initiator need not be a "caller" in a telephony link.
contents.zh-CHS: 任何一方均可在任何时候发起交易。例如，发起方不必是电话链路中的“呼叫方”。

contents.text: The Initiator is responsible for recovering from all message losses by retransmission.
contents.zh-CHS: 发起方负责通过重新传输从所有消息丢失中恢复。

contents.text: 1.3. Security Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 1.3. 安全参数

contents.text: A Photuris exchange between two parties results in a pair of SPI values (one in each direction). Each SPI is used in creating separate session-key(s) in each direction.
contents.zh-CHS: 双方之间的光交换产生一对SPI值（每个方向一个）。每个SPI用于在每个方向上创建单独的会话密钥。

contents.text: The SPI is assigned by the entity controlling the IP Destination: the SPI Owner (receiver). The parties use the combination of IP Destination, IP (Next Header) Protocol, and SPI to distinguish the correct Security Association.
contents.zh-CHS: SPI由控制IP目的地的实体分配：SPI所有者（接收方）。双方使用IP目的地、IP（下一个报头）协议和SPI的组合来区分正确的安全关联。

contents.text: When both parties initiate Photuris exchanges concurrently, or one party initiates more than one Photuris exchange, the Initiator Cookies (and UDP Ports) keep the exchanges separate. This results in more than one initial SPI for each Destination.
contents.zh-CHS: 当双方同时发起Photuris交换，或一方发起多个Photuris交换时，发起方Cookie（和UDP端口）会将交换分开。这会导致每个目的地有多个初始SPI。

contents.text: To create multiple SPIs with different parameters, the parties may also send SPI_Updates.
contents.zh-CHS: 要创建具有不同参数的多个SPI，各方还可以发送SPI_更新。

contents.text: There is no requirement that all such outstanding SPIs be used. The SPI User (sender) selects an appropriate SPI for each datagram transmission.
contents.zh-CHS: 不要求使用所有此类优秀的SPI。SPI用户（发送方）为每个数据报传输选择适当的SPI。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: The method used for SPI assignment is implementation dependent. The only requirement is that the SPI be unique for the IP Destination and IP (Next Header) Protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 用于SPI分配的方法取决于实现。唯一的要求是SPI对于IP目的地和IP（下一个报头）协议是唯一的。

contents.text: However, selection of a cryptographically random SPI value can help prevent attacks that depend on a predicatable sequence of values. The implementor MUST NOT expect SPI values to have a particular order or range.
contents.zh-CHS: 但是，选择加密随机SPI值有助于防止依赖于可预测值序列的攻击。实现者不能期望SPI值具有特定的顺序或范围。

contents.text: 1.4. LifeTimes
The Photuris exchange results in two kinds of state, each with separate LifeTimes.
contents.zh-CHS: 光交换产生两种状态，每种状态都有各自的寿命。

contents.text: 1) The Exchange LifeTime of the small amount of state associated with the Photuris exchange itself. This state may be viewed as between Internet nodes.
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 与Photuris交换本身关联的少量状态的交换生存期。可以将此状态视为Internet节点之间的状态。

contents.text: 2) The SPI LifeTimes of the individual SPIs that are established. This state may be viewed as between users and nodes.
contents.zh-CHS: 2) 已建立的单个SPI的SPI寿命。此状态可以在用户和节点之间查看。

contents.text: The SPI LifeTimes may be shorter or longer than the Exchange LifeTime. These LifeTimes are not required to be related to each other.
contents.zh-CHS: SPI生存期可能短于或长于交换生存期。这些生命周期不需要相互关联。

contents.text: When an Exchange-Value expires (or is replaced by a newer value), any unexpired derived SPIs are not affected. This is important to allow traffic to continue without interruption during new Photuris exchanges.
contents.zh-CHS: 当交换值过期（或被较新的值替换）时，任何未过期的派生SPI都不会受到影响。这对于在新的Photuris交换期间允许通信量继续而不中断非常重要。

contents.text: 1.4.1. Exchange LifeTimes
contents.zh-CHS: 1.4.1. 交换寿命

contents.text: All retained exchange state of both parties has an associated Exchange LifeTime (ELT), and is subject to periodic expiration. This depends on the physical and logistical security of the machine, and is typically in the range of 10 minutes to one day (default 30 minutes).
contents.zh-CHS: 双方的所有保留交换状态都有一个关联的交换生存期（ELT），并且会定期到期。这取决于机器的物理和后勤安全，通常为10分钟到一天（默认为30分钟）。

contents.text: In addition, during a Photuris exchange, an Exchange TimeOut (ETO) limits the wait for the exchange to complete. This timeout includes the packet round trips, and the time for completing the Identification Exchange calculations. The time is bounded by both the maximum amount of calculation delay expected for the processing power of an unknown peer, and the minimum user expectation for
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，在Photuris交换期间，交换超时（ETO）限制交换完成的等待。此超时包括数据包往返以及完成标识交换计算的时间。该时间由未知对等方的处理能力预期的最大计算延迟量和未知对等方的最小用户期望值限定

contents.text: results (default 30 seconds).
contents.zh-CHS: 结果（默认为30秒）。

contents.text: These Exchange LifeTimes and TimeOuts are implementation dependent and are not disclosed in any Photuris message. The paranoid operator will have a fairly short Exchange LifeTime, but it MUST NOT be less than twice the ETO.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些交换生存期和超时取决于实现，不会在任何Photuris消息中公开。偏执狂操作员的交换生存期相当短，但不得小于ETO的两倍。

contents.text: To prevent synchronization between Photuris exchanges, the implementation SHOULD randomly vary each Exchange LifeTime within twice the range of seconds that are required to calculate a new Exchange-Value. For example, when the Responder uses a base ELT of 30 minutes, and takes 10 seconds to calculate the new Exchange-Value, the equation might be (in milliseconds):
contents.zh-CHS: 为了防止Photuris交换之间的同步，实现应该在计算新交换值所需的两倍秒范围内随机改变每个交换生存期。例如，当响应者使用30分钟的基本ELT，并用10秒计算新的交换值时，方程式可能是（以毫秒为单位）：

contents.text: The Exchange-Scheme, Exchange-Values, and resulting shared-secret MAY be cached in short-term storage for the Exchange LifeTime. When repetitive Photuris exchanges occur between the same parties, and the Exchange-Values are discovered to be unchanged, the previously calculated shared-secret can be used to rapidly generate new session-keys.
contents.zh-CHS: 交换方案、交换值和由此产生的共享秘密可以在交换生存期内缓存在短期存储器中。当同一方之间发生重复的Photuris交换，并且发现交换值没有变化时，可以使用先前计算的共享密钥快速生成新的会话密钥。

contents.text: 1.4.2. SPI LifeTimes
contents.zh-CHS: 1.4.2. SPI寿命

contents.text: Each SPI has an associated LifeTime, specified by the SPI owner (receiver). This SPI LifeTime (SPILT) is usually related to the speed of the link (typically 2 to 30 minutes), but it MUST NOT be less than thrice the ETO.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个SPI都有一个相关的生存期，由SPI所有者（接收方）指定。SPI寿命（SPILT）通常与链路速度有关（通常为2到30分钟），但不得小于ETO的三倍。

contents.text: The SPI can also be deleted by the SPI Owner using the SPI_Update. Once the SPI has expired or been deleted, the parties cease using the SPI.
contents.zh-CHS: SPI所有者也可以使用SPI_更新删除SPI。一旦SPI过期或被删除，双方将停止使用SPI。

contents.text: To prevent synchronization between multiple Photuris exchanges, the implementation SHOULD randomly vary each SPI LifeTime. For example, when the Responder uses a base SPILT of 5 minutes, and 30 seconds for the ETO, the equation might be (in milliseconds):
contents.zh-CHS: 为了防止多个Photuris交换之间的同步，实现应该随机改变每个SPI生存期。例如，当响应者使用5分钟的基数溢出，ETO使用30秒时，等式可能是（以毫秒为单位）：

contents.text: There is no requirement that a long LifeTime be accepted by the SPI User. The SPI User might never use an established SPI, or cease using the SPI at any time.
contents.zh-CHS: SPI用户不需要接受较长的生命周期。SPI用户可能永远不会使用已建立的SPI，或随时停止使用SPI。

contents.text: When more than one unexpired SPI is available to the SPI User for the same function, a common implementation technique is to select the SPI
contents.zh-CHS: 当SPI用户可以为同一功能使用多个未过期的SPI时，常用的实现技术是选择SPI

contents.text: with the greatest remaining LifeTime. However, selecting randomly among a large number of SPIs might provide some defense against traffic analysis.
contents.zh-CHS: 用最长的余生。然而，在大量SPI中随机选择可能会对流量分析提供一些防御。

contents.text: To prevent resurrection of deleted or expired SPIs, SPI Owners SHOULD remember those SPIs, but mark them as unusable until the Photuris exchange shared-secret used to create them also expires and purges the associated state.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了防止已删除或过期的SPI重新出现，SPI所有者应该记住这些SPI，但要将它们标记为不可用，直到用于创建它们的Photuris exchange共享机密也过期并清除关联状态。

contents.text: When the SPI Owner detects an incoming SPI that has recently expired, but the associated exchange state has not yet been purged, the implementation MAY accept the SPI. The length of time allowed is highly dependent on clock drift and variable packet round trip time, and is therefore implementation dependent.
contents.zh-CHS: 当SPI所有者检测到最近过期的传入SPI，但关联的exchange状态尚未清除时，实现可能会接受该SPI。允许的时间长度高度依赖于时钟漂移和可变数据包往返时间，因此依赖于实现。

contents.text: 1.5. Random Number Generation
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5. 随机数生成

contents.text: The security of Photuris critically depends on the quality of the secret random numbers generated by each party. A poor random number generator at either party will compromise the shared-secret produced by the algorithm.
contents.zh-CHS: Photuris的安全性关键取决于各方生成的秘密随机数的质量。任何一方的不良随机数生成器都会破坏算法产生的共享秘密。

contents.text: Generating cryptographic quality random numbers on a general purpose computer without hardware assistance is a very tricky problem. In general, this requires using a cryptographic hashing function to "distill" the entropy from a large number of semi-random external events, such as the timing of key strokes. An excellent discussion can be found in [RFC-1750].
contents.zh-CHS: 在没有硬件帮助的情况下，在通用计算机上生成加密质量的随机数是一个非常棘手的问题。一般来说，这需要使用加密散列函数从大量半随机外部事件（如按键时间）中“提取”熵。在[RFC-1750]中可以找到一个很好的讨论。

contents.text: 2. Protocol Details
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 协议详情

contents.text: The Initiator begins a Photuris exchange under several circumstances:
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器在以下几种情况下开始Photuris交换：

contents.text: - The Initiator has a datagram that it wishes to send with confidentiality, and has no current Photuris exchange state with the IP Destination. This datagram is discarded, and a Cookie_Request is sent instead.
contents.zh-CHS: - 发起者有一个数据报，它希望以保密的方式发送，并且与IP目标没有当前的Photuris交换状态。该数据报将被丢弃，并发送Cookie_请求。

contents.text: - The Initiator has received the ICMP message [RFC-1812] Destination Unreachable: Communication Administratively Prohibited (Type 3, Code 13), and has no current Photuris exchange state with the ICMP Source.
contents.zh-CHS: - 发起方已收到ICMP消息[RFC-1812]目的地不可访问：管理禁止通信（类型3，代码13），并且与ICMP源没有当前Photuris交换状态。

contents.text: - The Initiator has received the ICMP message [RFC-2521] Security Failures: Bad SPI (Type 40, Code 0), that matches current Photuris exchange state with the ICMP Source.
contents.zh-CHS: - 启动器已收到ICMP消息[RFC-2521]安全故障：错误SPI（类型40，代码0），该消息与ICMP源的当前Photuris exchange状态相匹配。

contents.text: - The Initiator has received the ICMP message [RFC-2521] Security Failures: Need Authentication (Type 40, Code 4), and has no current Photuris exchange state with the ICMP Source.
contents.zh-CHS: - 启动器已收到ICMP消息[RFC-2521]安全故障：需要身份验证（类型40，代码4），并且与ICMP源没有当前的Photuris交换状态。

contents.text: - The Initiator has received the ICMP message [RFC-2521] Security Failures: Need Authorization (Type 40, Code 5), that matches current Photuris exchange state with the ICMP Source.
contents.zh-CHS: - 发起方已收到ICMP消息[RFC-2521]安全故障：需要授权（类型40，代码5），该消息将当前Photuris exchange状态与ICMP源匹配。

contents.text: When the event is an ICMP message, special care MUST be taken that the ICMP message actually includes information that matches a previously sent IP datagram. Otherwise, this could provide an opportunity for a clogging attack, by stimulating a new Photuris Exchange.
contents.zh-CHS: 当事件是ICMP消息时，必须特别注意ICMP消息实际包含与先前发送的IP数据报匹配的信息。否则，通过刺激新的Photuris交换，这可能为阻塞攻击提供机会。

contents.text: 2.1. UDP
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1. UDP

contents.text: All Photuris messages use the User Datagram Protocol header [RFC-768]. The Initiator sends to UDP Destination Port 468.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有Photuris消息都使用用户数据报协议头[RFC-768]。启动器发送到UDP目标端口468。

contents.text: When replying to the Initiator, the Responder swaps the IP Source and Destination, and the UDP Source and Destination Ports.
contents.zh-CHS: 当响应发起方时，响应方交换IP源和目标以及UDP源和目标端口。

contents.text: The UDP checksum MUST be correctly calculated when sent. When a message is received with an incorrect UDP checksum, it is silently discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 发送时必须正确计算UDP校验和。当接收到带有不正确UDP校验和的消息时，会自动丢弃该消息。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: It is expected that installation of Photuris will ensure that UDP checksum calculations are enabled for the computer operating system and later disabling by operators is prevented.
contents.zh-CHS: 预计Photuris的安装将确保为计算机操作系统启用UDP校验和计算，并防止操作员稍后禁用。

contents.text: Internet Protocol version 4 [RFC-791] restricts the maximum reassembled datagram to 576 bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 互联网协议版本4[RFC-791]将最大重组数据报限制为576字节。

contents.text: When processing datagrams containing variable size values, the length must be checked against the overall datagram length. An invalid size (too long or short) that causes a poorly coded receiver to abort could be used as a denial of service attack.
contents.zh-CHS: 当处理包含可变大小值的数据报时，必须对照总数据报长度检查长度。导致编码错误的接收器中止的无效大小（太长或太短）可被用作拒绝服务攻击。

contents.text: 2.2. Header Format
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2. 标题格式

contents.text: All of the messages have a format similar to the following, as transmitted left to right in network order (most significant to least significant):
contents.zh-CHS: 所有消息的格式与以下类似，按网络顺序从左到右传输（最高有效到最低有效）：

contents.text: Initiator-Cookie 16 bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器Cookie 16个字节。

contents.text: Responder-Cookie 16 bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应器Cookie 16字节。

contents.text: Message 1 byte. Each message type has a unique value. Initial values are assigned as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 消息1字节。每种消息类型都有一个唯一的值。初始值分配如下：

contents.text: 0 Cookie_Request 1 Cookie_Response 2 Value_Request 3 Value_Response 4 Identity_Request 5 Secret_Response (optional) 6 Secret_Request (optional) 7 Identity_Response 8 SPI_Needed 9 SPI_Update 10 Bad_Cookie 11 Resource_Limit 12 Verification_Failure 13 Message_Reject
contents.zh-CHS: 0 Cookie\u请求1 Cookie\u响应2值\u请求3值\u响应4身份\u请求5机密\u响应（可选）6机密\u请求（可选）7身份\u响应8 SPI\u需要9 SPI\u更新10坏的\u Cookie 11资源限制12验证\u失败13消息\u拒绝

contents.text: Further details and differences are elaborated in the individual messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 进一步的细节和差异将在单独的消息中详细说明。

contents.text: 2.3. Variable Precision Integers
contents.zh-CHS: 2.3. 可变精度整数

contents.text: Size 2, 4, or 8 bytes. The number of significant bits used in the Value field. Always transmitted most significant byte first.
contents.zh-CHS: 大小为2、4或8字节。值字段中使用的有效位数。始终先传输最高有效字节。

contents.text: When the Size is zero, no Value field is present; there are no significant bits. This means "missing" or "null". It should not be confused with the value zero, which includes an indication of the number of significant bits.
contents.zh-CHS: 当大小为零时，不存在值字段；没有有效位。这意味着“缺失”或“空”。不应将其与值0混淆，后者包括有效位数量的指示。

contents.text: When the most significant byte is in the range 0 through 254 (0xfe), the field is 2 bytes. Both bytes are used to indicate the size of the Value field, which ranges from 1 to 65,279 significant bits (in 1 to 8,160 bytes).
contents.zh-CHS: 当最高有效字节在0到254（0xfe）范围内时，字段为2字节。这两个字节都用于指示值字段的大小，范围为1到65279个有效位（1到8160字节）。

contents.text: When the most significant byte is 255 (0xff), the field is 4 bytes. The remaining 3 bytes are added to 65,280 to indicate the size of the Value field, which is limited to 16,776,959 significant bits (in
contents.zh-CHS: 当最高有效字节为255（0xff）时，字段为4个字节。剩余的3个字节添加到65280以指示值字段的大小，该字段限制为16776959个有效位（在

contents.text: When the most significant 2 bytes are 65,535 (0xffff), the field is 8 bytes. The remaining 6 bytes are added to 16,776,960 to indicate the size of the Value field.
contents.zh-CHS: 当最高有效2字节为65535（0xffff）时，字段为8字节。剩余的6个字节添加到16776960以指示值字段的大小。

contents.text: Value 0 or more bytes. Always transmitted most significant byte first.
contents.zh-CHS: 值0或更多字节。始终先传输最高有效字节。

contents.text: The bits used are right justified within byte boundaries; that is, any unused bits are in the most significant byte. When there are no unused bits, or unused bits are zero filled, the value is assumed to be an unsigned positive integer.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用的位在字节边界内右对齐；也就是说，任何未使用的位都位于最高有效字节中。如果没有未使用的位，或者未使用的位为零填充，则假定该值为无符号正整数。

contents.text: When the leading unused bits are ones filled, the number is assumed to be a two's-complement negative integer. A negative integer will always have at least one unused leading sign bit in the most significant byte.
contents.zh-CHS: 当前导未使用的位是已填充的位时，该数字被假定为一个二补负整数。负整数的最高有效字节中始终至少有一个未使用的前导符号位。

contents.text: Shortened forms SHOULD NOT be used when the Value includes a number of leading zero significant bits. The Size SHOULD indicate the correct number of significant bits.
contents.zh-CHS: 当值包含多个前导零有效位时，不应使用缩写形式。大小应指示有效位的正确数量。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: Negative integers are not required to be supported, but are included for completeness.
contents.zh-CHS: 不需要支持负整数，但为了完整性，需要包含负整数。

contents.text: No more than 65,279 significant bits are required to be supported. Other ranges are vastly too long for these UDP messages, but are included for completeness.
contents.zh-CHS: 需要支持的有效位不超过65279位。其他范围对于这些UDP消息来说太长了，但为了完整性而包括在内。

contents.text: 2.4. Exchange-Schemes
contents.zh-CHS: 2.4. 交换方案

contents.text: Scheme 2 bytes. A unique value indicating the Exchange-Scheme. See the "Basic Exchange-Schemes" for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 方案2字节。指示交换方案的唯一值。详见“基本兑换方案”。

contents.text: Size 2 bytes, ranging from 0 to 65,279. See "Variable Precision Integer".
contents.zh-CHS: 大小为2字节，范围从0到65279。请参阅“可变精度整数”。

contents.text: Value 0 or more bytes. See "Variable Precision Integer".
contents.zh-CHS: 值0或更多字节。请参阅“可变精度整数”。

contents.text: The Size MUST NOT be assumed to be constant for a particular Scheme. Multiple kinds of the same Scheme with varying Sizes MAY be present in any list of schemes.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于特定方案，不得假定大小为常数。任何方案列表中都可能存在多种不同大小的相同方案。

contents.text: However, only one of each Scheme and Size combination will be present in any list of schemes.
contents.zh-CHS: 但是，在任何方案列表中，每个方案和尺寸组合中只有一个。

contents.text: 2.5. Attributes
Attribute 1 byte. A unique value indicating the kind of attribute. See the "Basic Attributes" for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性1字节。指示属性类型的唯一值。有关详细信息，请参见“基本属性”。

contents.text: When the value is zero (padding), no Length field is present (always zero).
contents.zh-CHS: 值为零（填充）时，不存在长度字段（始终为零）。

contents.text: Length 1 byte. The size of the Value(s) field in bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度为1字节。值字段的大小（以字节为单位）。

contents.text: When the Length is zero, no Value(s) field is present.
contents.zh-CHS: 当长度为零时，不存在值字段。

contents.text: Value(s) 0 or more bytes. See the "Basic Attributes" for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 值为0个或更多字节。有关详细信息，请参见“基本属性”。

contents.text: The Length MUST NOT be assumed to be constant for a particular
contents.zh-CHS: 对于特定的情况，长度不得假定为常数

contents.text: Attribute. Multiple kinds of the same Attribute with varying Lengths MAY be present in any list of attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性任何属性列表中都可能存在具有不同长度的多种相同属性。

contents.text: 3. Cookie Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 饼干交换

contents.text:
Initiator                            Responder
=========                            =========
Cookie_Request                 ->
                                <-   Cookie_Response
                                        offer schemes
3.0.1. Send Cookie_Request
contents.zh-CHS: 3.0.1. 发送Cookie\u请求

contents.text: The Initiator initializes local state, and generates a unique "cookie". The Initiator-Cookie MUST be different in each new Cookie_Request between the same parties. See "Cookie Generation" for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器初始化本地状态，并生成唯一的“cookie”。发起方Cookie在同一方之间的每个新Cookie\u请求中必须不同。有关详细信息，请参阅“Cookie生成”。

contents.text: - If any previous exchange between the peer IP nodes has not expired in which this party was the Initiator, this Responder-Cookie is set to the most recent Responder-Cookie, and this Counter is set to the corresponding Counter.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果对等IP节点之间的任何先前交换（该方是发起方）尚未过期，则此响应程序Cookie将设置为最新的响应程序Cookie，并且此计数器将设置为相应的计数器。

contents.text: For example, a new Virtual Private Network (VPN) tunnel is about to be established to an existing partner. The Counter is the same value received in the prior Cookie_Response, the Responder-Cookie remains the same, and a new Initiator-Cookie is generated.
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，一个新的虚拟专用网络（VPN）隧道即将建立到现有的合作伙伴。计数器与之前的Cookie_响应中接收到的值相同，响应器Cookie保持不变，并生成新的启动器Cookie。

contents.text: - If the new Cookie_Request is in response to a message of a previous exchange in which this party was the Responder, this Responder-Cookie is set to the previous Initiator-Cookie, and this Counter is set to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果新的Cookie_请求是对该方是响应方的先前交换的消息的响应，则此响应方Cookie将设置为先前发起方Cookie，并且此计数器将设置为零。

contents.text: For example, a Bad_Cookie message was received from the previous Initiator in response to SPI_Needed. The Responder-Cookie is replaced with the Initiator-Cookie, and a new Initiator-Cookie is generated. This provides bookkeeping to detect bogus Bad_Cookie messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，为了响应所需的SPI，从前一个启动器接收到一条错误的Cookie消息。响应程序Cookie将替换为启动器Cookie，并生成新的启动器Cookie。这提供了簿记来检测虚假的坏消息。

contents.text: Also, can be used for bi-directional User, Transport, and Process oriented keying. Such mechanisms are outside the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，还可以用于双向用户、传输和面向进程的键控。这些机制不在本文件的范围之内。

contents.text: - Otherwise, this Responder-Cookie and Counter are both set to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: - 否则，此响应器Cookie和计数器都设置为零。

contents.text: By default, the Initiator operates in the same manner as when all of its previous exchange state has expired. The Responder will send a Resource_Limit when its own exchange state has not expired.
contents.zh-CHS: 默认情况下，启动器的操作方式与它以前的所有exchange状态都已过期时相同。当响应程序自己的exchange状态尚未过期时，它将发送一个资源\u限制。

contents.text: The Initiator also starts a retransmission timer. If no valid Cookie_Response arrives within the time limit, the same Cookie_Request is retransmitted for the remaining number of Retransmissions. The Initiator-Cookie value MUST be the same in each such retransmission to the same IP Destination and UDP Port.
contents.zh-CHS: 发起方还启动重传计时器。如果在时间限制内没有有效的Cookie_响应到达，则针对剩余的重新传输次数重新传输相同的Cookie_请求。启动器Cookie值在每次此类重新传输到同一IP目标和UDP端口时必须相同。

contents.text: When Retransmissions have been exceeded, if a Resource_Limit message has been received during the exchange, the Initiator SHOULD begin the Photuris exchange again by sending a new Cookie_Request with updated values.
contents.zh-CHS: 当超过重新传输时，如果在交换期间收到资源限制消息，则发起方应通过发送具有更新值的新Cookie_请求再次开始Photuris交换。

contents.text: 3.0.2. Receive Cookie_Request
contents.zh-CHS: 3.0.2. 接收Cookie\u请求

contents.text: On receipt of a Cookie_Request, the Responder determines whether there are sufficient resources to begin another Photuris exchange.
contents.zh-CHS: 收到Cookie_请求后，响应者确定是否有足够的资源开始另一次Photuris交换。

contents.text: - When too many SPI values are already in use for this particular peer, or too many concurrent exchanges are in progress, or some other resource limit is reached, a Resource_Limit message is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当太多SPI值已用于此特定对等方，或有太多并发交换正在进行，或达到某些其他资源限制时，将发送资源限制消息。

contents.text: - When any previous exchange initiated by this particular peer has not exceeded the Exchange TimeOut, and the Responder-Cookie does not specify one of these previous exchanges, a Resource_Limit message is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当此特定对等方发起的任何以前的交换未超过交换超时，并且响应程序Cookie未指定这些以前的交换之一时，将发送一条资源限制消息。

contents.text: Otherwise, the Responder returns a Cookie_Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 否则，响应程序将返回Cookie\u响应。

contents.text: Note that the Responder creates no additional state at this time.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，响应程序此时不创建其他状态。

contents.text: 3.0.3. Send Cookie_Response
contents.zh-CHS: 3.0.3. 发送Cookie\u响应

contents.text: The IP Source for the Initiator is examined. If any previous exchange between the peer IP nodes has not expired, the response Counter is set to the most recent exchange Counter plus one (allowing for out of order retransmissions). Otherwise, the response Counter is set to the request Counter plus one.
contents.zh-CHS: 已检查启动器的IP源。如果对等IP节点之间以前的任何交换尚未过期，则响应计数器将设置为最近的交换计数器加上一个（允许无序重新传输）。否则，响应计数器设置为请求计数器加一。

contents.text: If (through rollover of the Counter) the new Counter value is zero (modulo 256), the value is set to one.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果（通过计数器的滚动）新计数器值为零（模256），则该值设置为一。

contents.text: If this new Counter value matches some previous exchange initiated by this particular peer that has not yet exceeded the Exchange TimeOut,
contents.zh-CHS: 如果此新计数器值与此特定对等方之前发起的尚未超过交换超时的某个交换相匹配，

contents.text: the Counter is incremented again, until a unique Counter value is reached.
contents.zh-CHS: 计数器再次递增，直到达到唯一的计数器值。

contents.text: Nota Bene: No more than 254 concurrent exchanges between the same two peers are supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：同两个对等点之间支持的并发交换不超过254次。

contents.text: The Responder generates a unique cookie. The Responder-Cookie value in each successive response SHOULD be different. See "Cookie Generation" for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应程序生成一个唯一的cookie。每个后续响应中的响应器Cookie值应该不同。有关详细信息，请参阅“Cookie生成”。

contents.text: The Exchange-Schemes available between the peers are listed in the Offered-Schemes.
contents.zh-CHS: 提供的方案中列出了对等方之间可用的交换方案。

contents.text: 3.0.4. Receive Cookie_Response
contents.zh-CHS: 3.0.4. 接收Cookie\u响应

contents.text: The Initiator validates the Initiator-Cookie, and the Offered-Schemes.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器验证启动器Cookie和提供的方案。

contents.text: - When an invalid/expired Initiator-Cookie is detected, the message is silently discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当检测到无效/过期的启动器Cookie时，该消息将被自动丢弃。

contents.text: - When the variable length Offered-Schemes do not match the UDP Length, or all Offered-Schemes are obviously defective and/or insufficient for the purposes intended, the message is silently discarded; the implementation SHOULD log the occurance, and notify an operator as appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当提供的可变长度方案与UDP长度不匹配，或者所有提供的方案明显有缺陷和/或不足以达到预期目的时，消息将被悄悄地丢弃；实施应记录发生的情况，并酌情通知操作员。

contents.text: - Once a valid message has been received, later Cookie_Responses with matching Initiator-Cookies are also silently discarded, until a new Cookie_Request is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 一旦接收到有效消息，随后带有匹配启动器Cookie的Cookie\u响应也会被静默丢弃，直到发送新的Cookie\u请求。

contents.text: When the message is valid, an Exchange-Scheme is chosen from the list of Offered-Schemes.
contents.zh-CHS: 当消息有效时，将从提供的方案列表中选择一个交换方案。

contents.text: This Scheme-Choice may affect the next Photuris message sent. By default, the next Photuris message is a Value_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 此方案选择可能会影响发送的下一条Photuris消息。默认情况下，下一条Photuris消息是一个Value\u请求。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: Only the Initiator-Cookie is used to identify the exchange. The Counter and Responder-Cookie will both be different from the Cookie_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 只有启动器Cookie用于标识交换。计数器和响应器Cookie都将与Cookie\u请求不同。

contents.text: Various proposals for extensions utilize the Scheme-Choice to indicate a different message sequence. Such mechanisms are outside the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 各种扩展方案利用方案选择来指示不同的消息序列。这些机制不在本文件的范围之内。

contents.text: 3.1. Cookie_Request
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1. Cookie_请求

contents.text: Initiator-Cookie 16 bytes. A randomized value that identifies the exchange. The value MUST NOT be zero. See "Cookie Generation" for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器Cookie 16个字节。标识交换的随机值。该值不能为零。有关详细信息，请参阅“Cookie生成”。

contents.text: Responder-Cookie 16 bytes. Identifies a specific previous exchange. Copied from a previous Cookie_Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应器Cookie 16字节。标识以前的特定交换。从以前的Cookie\u响应复制。

contents.text: When zero, no previous exchange is specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果为零，则不指定以前的交换。

contents.text: When non-zero, and the Counter is zero, contains the Initiator-Cookie of a previous exchange. The specified party is requested to be the Responder in this exchange, to retain previous party pairings.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果非零且计数器为零，则包含上一次交换的启动器Cookie。指定方被请求作为此交换中的响应方，以保留以前的方配对。

contents.text: When non-zero, and the Counter is also non-zero, contains the Responder-Cookie of a previous exchange. The specified party is requested to be the Responder in this exchange, to retain previous party pairings.
contents.zh-CHS: 当非零且计数器也非零时，包含上一次交换的响应者Cookie。指定方被请求作为此交换中的响应方，以保留以前的方配对。

contents.text: Message 0
contents.zh-CHS: 消息0

contents.text: Counter 1 byte. Indicates the number of previous exchanges.
contents.zh-CHS: 计数器1字节。指示以前交换的次数。

contents.text: When zero, the Responder-Cookie indicates the Initiator of a previous exchange, or no previous exchange is specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 当为零时，响应器Cookie表示先前交换的发起方，或者未指定先前交换。

contents.text: When non-zero, the Responder-Cookie indicates the Responder to a previous exchange. This value is set to the Counter from the corresponding Cookie_Response or from a Resource_Limit.
contents.zh-CHS: 当非零时，响应者Cookie指示前一次交换的响应者。此值设置为相应Cookie_响应或资源限制中的计数器。

contents.text: 3.2. Cookie_Response
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2. Cookie_响应

contents.text: Initiator-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the Cookie_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器Cookie 16个字节。从Cookie_请求复制。

contents.text: Responder-Cookie 16 bytes. A randomized value that identifies the exchange. The value MUST NOT be zero. See "Cookie Generation" for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应器Cookie 16字节。标识交换的随机值。该值不能为零。有关详细信息，请参阅“Cookie生成”。

contents.text: Message 1
contents.zh-CHS: 信息1

contents.text: Counter 1 byte. Indicates the number of the current exchange. Must be greater than zero.
contents.zh-CHS: 计数器1字节。指示当前交换机的号码。必须大于零。

contents.text: Offered-Schemes 4 or more bytes. A list of one or more Exchange-Schemes supported by the Responder, ordered from most to least preferable. See the "Basic Exchange-Schemes" for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 提供了4个或更多字节的方案。由响应程序支持的一个或多个交换方案的列表，按从高到低的顺序排列。详见“基本兑换方案”。

contents.text: Only one Scheme (#2) is required to be supported, and SHOULD be present in every Offered-Schemes list.
contents.zh-CHS: 只需要支持一个方案（#2），并且应该出现在每个提供的方案列表中。

contents.text: More than one of each kind of Scheme may be offered, but each is distinguished by its Size. The end of the list is indicated by the UDP Length.
contents.zh-CHS: 每种计划可提供不止一种，但每种计划都因其规模而不同。列表的末尾由UDP长度指示。

contents.text: 3.3. Cookie Generation
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3. Cookie生成

contents.text: The exact technique by which a Photuris party generates a cookie is implementation dependent. The method chosen must satisfy some basic requirements:
contents.zh-CHS: Photuris方生成cookie的确切技术取决于实现。选择的方法必须满足一些基本要求：

contents.text: 1. The cookie MUST depend on the specific parties. This prevents an attacker from obtaining a cookie using a real IP address and UDP port, and then using it to swamp the victim with requests from randomly chosen IP addresses or ports.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. cookie必须取决于特定的参与方。这可以防止攻击者使用真实的IP地址和UDP端口获取cookie，然后使用它从随机选择的IP地址或端口向受害者发送请求。

contents.text: 2. It MUST NOT be possible for anyone other than the issuing entity to generate cookies that will be accepted by that entity. This implies that the issuing entity will use local secret information in the generation and subsequent verification of a cookie. It must not be possible to deduce this secret information from any particular cookie.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 发行实体以外的任何人不得生成该实体将接受的cookie。这意味着发布实体将在cookie的生成和后续验证中使用本地机密信息。不能从任何特定的cookie推断出此机密信息。

contents.text: 3. The cookie generation and verification methods MUST be fast to thwart attacks intended to sabotage CPU resources.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. cookie生成和验证方法必须快速，以阻止旨在破坏CPU资源的攻击。

contents.text: A recommended technique is to use a cryptographic hashing function (such as MD5).
contents.zh-CHS: 推荐的技术是使用加密哈希函数（如MD5）。

contents.text: An incoming cookie can be verified at any time by regenerating it locally from values contained in the incoming datagram and the local secret random value.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过从传入数据报中包含的值和本地机密随机值本地重新生成传入cookie，可以随时对传入cookie进行验证。

contents.text: 3.3.1. Initiator Cookie
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.1. 启动器Cookie

contents.text: The Initiator secret value that affects its cookie SHOULD change for each new Photuris exchange, and is thereafter internally cached on a per Responder basis. This provides improved synchronization and protection against replay attacks.
contents.zh-CHS: 影响其cookie的启动器秘密值应针对每个新的Photuris交换进行更改，并在此后按每个响应者进行内部缓存。这提供了改进的同步和防止重播攻击的保护。

contents.text: An alternative is to cache the cookie instead of the secret value. Incoming cookies can be compared directly without the computational cost of regeneration.
contents.zh-CHS: 另一种方法是缓存cookie而不是secret值。传入的cookie可以直接进行比较，而无需重新生成的计算成本。

contents.text: It is recommended that the cookie be calculated over the secret value, the IP Source and Destination addresses, and the UDP Source and Destination ports.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议通过机密值、IP源和目标地址以及UDP源和目标端口计算cookie。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: Although the recommendation includes the UDP Source port, this is very implementation specific. For example, it might not be included when the value is constant.
contents.zh-CHS: 虽然建议包括UDP源端口，但这是非常具体的实现。例如，当值为常量时，可能不包括该值。

contents.text: However, it is important that the implementation protect mutually suspicious users of the same machine from generating the same cookie.
contents.zh-CHS: 但是，重要的是，实现应保护同一台机器上相互可疑的用户不生成相同的cookie。

contents.text: 3.3.2. Responder Cookie
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2. 应答器Cookie

contents.text: The Responder secret value that affects its cookies MAY remain the same for many different Initiators. However, this secret SHOULD be changed periodically to limit the time for use of its cookies (typically each 60 seconds).
contents.zh-CHS: 对于许多不同的启动器，影响其Cookie的响应者机密值可能保持不变。但是，应定期更改此秘密，以限制其cookie的使用时间（通常每60秒一次）。

contents.text: The Responder-Cookie SHOULD include the Initiator-Cookie. The Responder-Cookie MUST include the Counter (that is returned in the Cookie_Response). This provides improved synchronization and protection against replay attacks.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应者Cookie应包括启动器Cookie。响应器Cookie必须包含计数器（在Cookie\u响应中返回）。这提供了改进的同步和防止重播攻击的保护。

contents.text: It is recommended that the cookie be calculated over the secret value, the IP Source and Destination addresses, its own UDP Destination port, the Counter, the Initiator-Cookie, and the currently Offered-Schemes.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议根据机密值、IP源和目标地址、其自己的UDP目标端口、计数器、启动器cookie和当前提供的方案计算cookie。

contents.text: The cookie is not cached per Initiator to avoid saving state during the initial Cookie Exchange. On receipt of a Value_Request (described later), the Responder regenerates its cookie for validation.
contents.zh-CHS: 不会为每个启动器缓存cookie，以避免在初始cookie交换期间保存状态。在收到Value_请求（稍后描述）时，响应者重新生成其cookie以进行验证。

contents.text: Once the Value_Response is sent (also described later), both Initiator and Responder cookies are cached to identify the exchange.
contents.zh-CHS: 发送值_响应后（稍后也将描述），启动器和响应程序cookie都将被缓存以标识交换。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: Although the recommendation does not include the UDP Source port, this is very implementation specific. It might be successfully included in some variants.
contents.zh-CHS: 虽然建议不包括UDP源端口，但这是非常具体的实现。它可能成功地包含在某些变体中。

contents.text: However, it is important that the UDP Source port not be included when matching existing Photuris exchanges for determining the appropriate Counter.
contents.zh-CHS: 但是，在匹配现有Photuris交换机以确定适当的计数器时，不包括UDP源端口是很重要的。

contents.text: The recommendation includes the Offered-Schemes to detect a dynamic change of scheme value between the Cookie_Response and
contents.zh-CHS: 该建议包括所提供的方案，用于检测Cookie_响应和响应之间的方案值的动态变化

contents.text: Value_Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 重视你的回应。

contents.text: Some mechanism MAY be needed to detect a dynamic change of pre-calculated Responder Exchange-Value between the Value_Response and Identity_Response. For example, change the secret value to render the cookie invalid, or explicitly mark the Photuris exchange state as expired.
contents.zh-CHS: 可能需要一些机制来检测预先计算的响应者交换值在值\响应和标识\响应之间的动态变化。例如，更改secret值以使cookie无效，或者显式地将Photuris交换状态标记为过期。

contents.text: 4. Value Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 价值交换

contents.text:
Initiator                            Responder
=========                            =========
Value_Request                  ->
   pick scheme
   offer value
   offer attributes
                                <-   Value_Response
                                        offer value
                                        offer attributes
[generate shared-secret from exchanged values]
contents.zh-CHS: [从交换的值生成共享机密]

contents.text: 4.0.1. Send Value_Request
contents.zh-CHS: 4.0.1. 发送值请求

contents.text: The Initiator generates an appropriate Exchange-Value for the Scheme-Choice. This Exchange-Value may be pre-calculated and used for multiple Responders.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器为方案选择生成适当的交换值。该交换值可预先计算并用于多个响应者。

contents.text: The IP Destination for the Responder is examined, and the attributes available between the parties are listed in the Offered-Attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 将检查响应者的IP目的地，并在提供的属性中列出各方之间可用的属性。

contents.text: The Initiator also starts a retransmission timer. If no valid Value_Response arrives within the time limit, the same Value_Request is retransmitted for the remaining number of Retransmissions.
contents.zh-CHS: 发起方还启动重传计时器。如果在时间限制内没有有效的Value_响应到达，则针对剩余的重新传输次数重新传输相同的Value_请求。

contents.text: When Retransmissions have been exceeded, if a Bad_Cookie or Resource_Limit message has been received during the exchange, the Initiator SHOULD begin the Photuris exchange again by sending a new Cookie_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 当超过重新传输时，如果在交换过程中收到错误的Cookie或资源限制消息，则发起方应通过发送新的Cookie请求再次开始Photuris交换。

contents.text: 4.0.2. Receive Value_Request
contents.zh-CHS: 4.0.2. 接收值请求

contents.text: The Responder validates the Responder-Cookie, the Counter, the Scheme-Choice, the Exchange-Value, and the Offered-Attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应程序验证响应程序Cookie、计数器、方案选择、交换值和提供的属性。

contents.text: - When an invalid/expired Responder-Cookie is detected, a Bad_Cookie message is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当检测到无效/过期的响应程序Cookie时，将发送一条错误的Cookie消息。

contents.text: - When too many SPI values are already in use for this particular peer, or too many concurrent exchanges are in progress, or some other resource limit is reached, a Resource_Limit message is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当太多SPI值已用于此特定对等方，或有太多并发交换正在进行，或达到某些其他资源限制时，将发送资源限制消息。

contents.text: - When an invalid Scheme-Choice is detected, or the Exchange-Value is obviously defective, or the variable length Offered-Attributes do not match the UDP Length, the message is silently discarded; the implementation SHOULD log the occurance, and notify an operator as appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当检测到无效的方案选择，或者交换值明显有缺陷，或者提供的可变长度属性与UDP长度不匹配时，消息将被自动丢弃；实施应记录发生的情况，并酌情通知操作员。

contents.text: When the message is valid, the Responder sets its Exchange timer to the Exchange TimeOut, and returns a Value_Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 当消息有效时，响应程序将其交换计时器设置为交换超时，并返回值\u Response。

contents.text: The Responder keeps a copy of the incoming Value_Request cookie pair, and its Value_Response. If a duplicate Value_Request is received, it merely resends its previous Value_Response, and takes no further action.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应程序保留传入值\u请求cookie对及其值\u响应的副本。如果收到重复的Value_请求，它只会重新发送其先前的Value_响应，而不采取进一步的操作。

contents.text: 4.0.3. Send Value_Response
contents.zh-CHS: 4.0.3. 发送值\u响应

contents.text: The Responder generates an appropriate Exchange-Value for the Scheme-Choice. This Exchange-Value may be pre-calculated and used for multiple Initiators.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应者为方案选择生成适当的交换值。该交换值可以预先计算并用于多个启动器。

contents.text: The IP Source for the Initiator is examined, and the attributes available between the parties are listed in the Offered-Attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 将检查启动器的IP源，并在提供的属性中列出各方之间可用的属性。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: At this time, the Responder begins calculation of the shared-secret. Calculation of the shared-secret is executed in parallel to minimize delay.
contents.zh-CHS: 此时，响应者开始计算共享秘密。并行执行共享秘密的计算以最小化延迟。

contents.text: This may take a substantial amount of time. The implementor should ensure that retransmission is not blocked by this calculation. This is not usually a problem, as retransmission timeouts typically exceed calculation time.
contents.zh-CHS: 这可能需要相当长的时间。实现者应确保重传不会被此计算阻止。这通常不是问题，因为重传超时通常超过计算时间。

contents.text: 4.0.4. Receive Value_Response
contents.zh-CHS: 4.0.4. 接收值\u响应

contents.text: The Initiator validates the pair of Cookies, the Exchange-Value, and the Offered-Attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器验证cookie对、交换值和提供的属性。

contents.text: - When an invalid/expired cookie is detected, the message is silently discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当检测到无效/过期的cookie时，该消息将被悄悄地丢弃。

contents.text: - When the Exchange-Value is obviously defective, or the variable length Offered-Attributes do not match the UDP Length, the message is silently discarded; the implementation SHOULD log the occurance, and notify an operator as appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当交换值明显有缺陷，或者提供的可变长度属性与UDP长度不匹配时，消息将被静默丢弃；实施应记录发生的情况，并酌情通知操作员。

contents.text: - Once a valid message has been received, later Value_Responses with both matching cookies are also silently discarded, until a new Cookie_Request is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 一旦收到有效消息，随后带有两个匹配Cookie的Value\u响应也会被静默丢弃，直到发送新的Cookie\u请求。

contents.text: When the message is valid, the Initiator begins its parallel computation of the shared-secret.
contents.zh-CHS: 当消息有效时，发起方开始并行计算共享密钥。

contents.text: When the Initiator completes computation, it sends an Identity_Request to the Responder.
contents.zh-CHS: 当发起方完成计算时，它向响应方发送一个Identity_请求。

contents.text: 4.1. Value_Request
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1. 价值请求

contents.text: Initiator-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the Cookie_Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器Cookie 16个字节。从Cookie\u响应中复制。

contents.text: Responder-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the Cookie_Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应器Cookie 16字节。从Cookie\u响应中复制。

contents.text: Message 2
contents.zh-CHS: 信息2

contents.text: Counter 1 byte. Copied from the Cookie_Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 计数器1字节。从Cookie\u响应中复制。

contents.text: Scheme-Choice 2 bytes. A value selected by the Initiator from the list of Offered-Schemes in the Cookie_Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 方案选择2字节。启动器从Cookie_响应中提供的方案列表中选择的值。

contents.text: Only the Scheme is specified; the Size will match the Initiator-Exchange-Value, and the Value(s) are implicit.
contents.zh-CHS: 只指定了方案；大小将与启动器交换值匹配，且值是隐式的。

contents.text: Initiator-Exchange-Value Variable Precision Integer. Provided by the Initiator for calculating a shared-secret between the parties. The Value format is indicated by the Scheme-Choice.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器交换值变量精度整数。由发起方提供，用于计算双方之间的共享秘密。值格式由方案选择指示。

contents.text: The field may be any integral number of bytes in length, as indicated by its Size field. It does not require any particular alignment. The 32-bit alignment shown is for convenience in the illustration.
contents.zh-CHS: 字段的长度可以是任何整数字节数，如其大小字段所示。它不需要任何特定的对齐。图中所示的32位对齐是为了方便起见。

contents.text: Initiator-Offered-Attributes 4 or more bytes. A list of Security Parameter attributes supported by the Initiator.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器提供了4个或更多字节的属性。启动器支持的安全参数属性列表。

contents.text: The contents and usage of this list are further described in "Offered Attributes List". The end of the list is indicated by the UDP Length.
contents.zh-CHS: 此列表的内容和用法在“提供的属性列表”中作了进一步说明。列表的末尾由UDP长度指示。

contents.text: 4.2. Value_Response
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2. 价值反应

contents.text: Initiator-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the Value_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器Cookie 16个字节。从值_请求复制。

contents.text: Responder-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the Value_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应器Cookie 16字节。从值_请求复制。

contents.text: Message 3
contents.zh-CHS: 信息3

contents.text: Reserved 3 bytes. For future use; MUST be set to zero when transmitted, and MUST be ignored when received.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留3个字节。供日后使用；传输时必须设置为零，接收时必须忽略。

contents.text: Responder-Exchange-Value Variable Precision Integer. Provided by the Responder for calculating a shared-secret between the parties. The Value format is indicated by the current Scheme-Choice specified in the Value_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应程序交换值变量精度整数。由响应者提供，用于计算双方之间的共享秘密。值格式由值请求中指定的当前方案选择指示。

contents.text: The field may be any integral number of bytes in
contents.zh-CHS: 该字段可以是任意整数个字节

contents.text: length, as indicated by its Size field. It does not require any particular alignment. The 32-bit alignment shown is for convenience in the illustration.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度，由其大小字段指示。它不需要任何特定的对齐。图中所示的32位对齐是为了方便起见。

contents.text: Responder-Offered-Attributes 4 or more bytes. A list of Security Parameter attributes supported by the Responder.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应程序提供了4个或更多字节的属性。响应程序支持的安全参数属性列表。

contents.text: The contents and usage of this list are further described in "Offered Attributes List". The end of the list is indicated by the UDP Length.
contents.zh-CHS: 此列表的内容和用法在“提供的属性列表”中作了进一步说明。列表的末尾由UDP长度指示。

contents.text: 4.3. Offered Attribute List
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3. 提供的属性列表

contents.text: This list includes those attributes supported by the party that are available to the other party. The attribute formats are specified in the "Basic Attributes".
contents.zh-CHS: 此列表包括该方支持的、可供另一方使用的属性。属性格式在“基本属性”中指定。

contents.text: The list is composed of two or three sections: Identification-Attributes, Authentication-Attributes, and (optional) Encapsulation-Attributes. Within each section, the attributes are ordered from most to least preferable.
contents.zh-CHS: 该列表由两个或三个部分组成：标识属性、身份验证属性和（可选）封装属性。在每个部分中，属性从最优先到最不优先排序。

contents.text: The first section of the list includes methods of identification. An Identity-Choice is selected from this list.
contents.zh-CHS: 清单的第一部分包括识别方法。将从此列表中选择一个标识选项。

contents.text: The second section of the list begins with "AH-Attributes" (#1). It includes methods of authentication, and other operational types.
contents.zh-CHS: 列表的第二部分以“AH属性”（#1）开头。它包括身份验证方法和其他操作类型。

contents.text: The third section of the list begins with "ESP-Attributes" (#2). It includes methods of authentication, compression, encryption, and other operational types. When no Encapsulation-Attributes are offered, the "ESP-Attributes" attribute itself is omitted from the list.
contents.zh-CHS: 列表的第三部分以“ESP属性”（2）开头。它包括身份验证、压缩、加密和其他操作类型的方法。当没有提供封装属性时，“ESP属性”属性本身将从列表中忽略。

contents.text: Attribute-Choices are selected from the latter two sections of the list.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性选项从列表的后两部分中选择。

contents.text: Support is required for the "MD5-IPMAC" (#5) attribute for both "Symmetric Identification" and "Authentication" and they SHOULD be present in every Offered-Attributes list.
contents.zh-CHS: “对称标识”和“身份验证”都需要“MD5-IPMAC”（#5）属性的支持，并且它们应该出现在每个提供的属性列表中。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: For example,
contents.zh-CHS: 例如

contents.text: "MD5-IPMAC" (Symmetric Identification), "AH-Attributes", "MD5-IPMAC" (Authentication).
contents.zh-CHS: “MD5-IPMAC”（对称标识）、“AH属性”、“MD5-IPMAC”（身份验证）。

contents.text: Since the offer is made by the prospective SPI User (sender), order of preference likely reflects the capabilities and engineering tradeoffs of a particular implementation.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于报价是由潜在的SPI用户（发送方）提出的，所以偏好顺序可能反映了特定实现的功能和工程权衡。

contents.text: However, the critical processing bottlenecks are frequently in the receiver. The SPI Owner (receiver) may express its needs by choosing a less preferable attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 然而，关键的处理瓶颈经常出现在接收器中。SPI所有者（接收者）可以通过选择不太可取的属性来表达其需求。

contents.text: The order may also be affected by operational policy and requested services for an application. Such considerations are outside the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 订单还可能受操作策略和应用程序请求的服务的影响。此类考虑不在本文件的范围内。

contents.text: The list may be divided into additional sections. These sections will always follow the ESP-Attributes section, and are indistinguishable from unrecognized attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 该清单可分为其他部分。这些部分将始终遵循ESP属性部分，并且与未识别的属性无法区分。

contents.text: The authentication, compression, encryption and identification mechanisms chosen, as well as the encapsulation modes (if any), need not be the same in both directions.
contents.zh-CHS: 选择的身份验证、压缩、加密和标识机制以及封装模式（如果有）在两个方向上不必相同。

contents.text: 5. Identification Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 身份交换

contents.text:
Initiator                            Responder
=========                            =========
Identity_Request               ->
   make SPI
   pick SPI attribute(s)
   identify self
   authenticate
   make privacy key(s)
   mask/encrypt message
                                <-   Identity_Response
                                        make SPI
                                        pick SPI attribute(s)
                                        identify self
                                        authenticate
                                        make privacy key(s)
                                        mask/encrypt message
[make SPI session-keys in each direction]
contents.zh-CHS: [在每个方向制作SPI会话密钥]

contents.text: The exchange of messages is ordered, although the formats and meanings of the messages are identical in each direction. The messages are easily distinguished by the parties themselves, by examining the Message and Identification fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 消息交换是有序的，尽管消息的格式和含义在每个方向上都是相同的。通过检查消息和标识字段，各方可以轻松区分消息。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: The amount of time for the calculation may be dependent on the value of particular bits in secret values used in generating the shared-secret or identity verification. To prevent analysis of these secret bits by recording the time for calculation, sending of the Identity_Messages SHOULD be delayed until the time expected for the longest calculation. This will be different for different processor speeds, different algorithms, and different length variables. Therefore, the method for estimating time is implementation dependent.
contents.zh-CHS: 计算的时间量可能取决于在生成共享秘密或身份验证时使用的秘密值中的特定比特的值。为了通过记录计算时间来防止对这些秘密位进行分析，应将Identity_消息的发送延迟到最长计算的预期时间。对于不同的处理器速度、不同的算法和不同的长度变量，这将是不同的。因此，估计时间的方法取决于实现。

contents.text: Any authenticated and/or encrypted user datagrams received before the completion of identity verification can be placed on a queue pending completion of this step. If verification succeeds, the queue is processed as though the datagrams had arrived subsequent to the verification. If verification fails, the queue is discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 在完成身份验证之前收到的任何经过身份验证和/或加密的用户数据报都可以放置在队列中，等待完成此步骤。如果验证成功，队列将被处理，就像数据报在验证之后到达一样。如果验证失败，则丢弃队列。

contents.text: 5.0.1. Send Identity_Request
contents.zh-CHS: 5.0.1. 发送身份验证请求

contents.text: The Initiator chooses an appropriate Identification, the SPI and SPILT, a set of Attributes for the SPI, calculates the Verification, and masks the message using the Privacy-Method indicated by the current Scheme-Choice.
contents.zh-CHS: 发起者选择适当的标识，即SPI和SPILT，SPI的一组属性，计算验证，并使用当前方案选择指示的隐私方法屏蔽消息。

contents.text: The Initiator also starts a retransmission timer. If no valid Identity_Response arrives within the time limit, its previous Identity_Request is retransmitted for the remaining number of Retransmissions.
contents.zh-CHS: 发起方还启动重传计时器。如果在时间限制内没有有效的Identity_响应到达，则其先前的Identity_请求将在剩余的重新传输次数内重新传输。

contents.text: When Retransmissions have been exceeded, if a Bad_Cookie message has been received during the exchange, the Initiator SHOULD begin the Photuris exchange again by sending a new Cookie_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 超过重新传输时，如果在交换过程中收到坏的Cookie消息，则发起方应通过发送新的Cookie请求再次开始Photuris交换。

contents.text: 5.0.2. Receive Identity_Request
contents.zh-CHS: 5.0.2. 接收身份验证请求

contents.text: The Responder validates the pair of Cookies, the Padding, the Identification, the Verification, and the Attribute-Choices.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应者验证cookie对、填充、标识、验证和属性选择。

contents.text: - When an invalid/expired cookie is detected, a Bad_Cookie message is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当检测到无效/过期的cookie时，将发送一条坏cookie消息。

contents.text: - After unmasking, when invalid Padding is detected, the variable length Attribute-Choices do not match the UDP Length, or an attribute was not in the Offered-Attributes, the message is silently discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: - 取消屏蔽后，如果检测到无效填充、可变长度属性选项与UDP长度不匹配，或者提供的属性中没有某个属性，则会自动丢弃消息。

contents.text: - When an invalid Identification is detected, or the message verification fails, a Verification_Failure message is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当检测到无效标识或消息验证失败时，将发送验证失败消息。

contents.text: - Whenever such a problem is detected, the Security Association is not established; the implementation SHOULD log the occurance, and notify an operator as appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: - 无论何时检测到此类问题，都不会建立安全关联；实施应记录发生的情况，并酌情通知操作员。

contents.text: When the message is valid, the Responder sets its Exchange timer to the Exchange LifeTime (if this has not already been done for a previous exchange). When its parallel computation of the shared-secret is complete, the Responder returns an Identity_Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 当消息有效时，响应程序将其交换计时器设置为交换生存期（如果之前的交换尚未执行此操作）。当共享秘密的并行计算完成时，响应者返回一个Identity\u响应。

contents.text: The Responder keeps a copy of the incoming Identity_Request values, and its Identity_Response. If a duplicate Identity_Request is received, it merely resends its previous Identity_Response, and takes no further action.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应程序保留传入标识请求值及其标识响应的副本。如果收到重复的Identity_请求，它只会重新发送其先前的Identity_响应，而不采取进一步的操作。

contents.text: 5.0.3. Send Identity_Response
contents.zh-CHS: 5.0.3. 发送标识\u响应

contents.text: The Responder chooses an appropriate Identification, the SPI and SPILT, a set of Attributes for the SPI, calculates the Verification, and masks the message using the Privacy-Method indicated by the current Scheme-Choice.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应者选择适当的标识，即SPI和SPILT，SPI的一组属性，计算验证，并使用当前方案选择指示的隐私方法屏蔽消息。

contents.text: The Responder calculates the SPI session-keys in both directions.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应程序在两个方向上计算SPI会话密钥。

contents.text: At this time, the Responder begins the authentication and/or encryption of user datagrams.
contents.zh-CHS: 此时，响应者开始对用户数据报进行身份验证和/或加密。

contents.text: 5.0.4. Receive Identity_Response
contents.zh-CHS: 5.0.4. 接收标识\u响应

contents.text: The Initiator validates the pair of Cookies, the Padding, the Identification, the Verification, and the Attribute-Choices.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器验证cookie对、填充、标识、验证和属性选择。

contents.text: - When an invalid/expired cookie is detected, the message is silently discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当检测到无效/过期的cookie时，该消息将被悄悄地丢弃。

contents.text: - After unmasking, when invalid Padding is detected, the variable length Attribute-Choices do not match the UDP Length, or an attribute was not in the Offered-Attributes, the message is silently discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: - 取消屏蔽后，如果检测到无效填充、可变长度属性选项与UDP长度不匹配，或者提供的属性中没有某个属性，则会自动丢弃消息。

contents.text: - When an invalid Identification is detected, or the message verification fails, a Verification_Failure message is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当检测到无效标识或消息验证失败时，将发送验证失败消息。

contents.text: - Whenever such a problem is detected, the Security Association is not established; the implementation SHOULD log the occurance, and notify an operator as appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: - 无论何时检测到此类问题，都不会建立安全关联；实施应记录发生的情况，并酌情通知操作员。

contents.text: - Once a valid message has been received, later Identity_Responses with both matching cookies are also silently discarded, until a new Cookie_Request is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 一旦收到有效消息，随后带有两个匹配Cookie的Identity_响应也会被静默丢弃，直到发送新的Cookie_请求。

contents.text: When the message is valid, the Initiator sets its Exchange timer to the Exchange LifeTime (if this has not already been done for a previous exchange).
contents.zh-CHS: 当消息有效时，启动器将其Exchange计时器设置为Exchange生存期（如果之前的Exchange尚未执行此操作）。

contents.text: The Initiator calculates the SPI session-keys in both directions.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器计算两个方向上的SPI会话密钥。

contents.text: At this time, the Initiator begins the authentication and/or encryption of user datagrams.
contents.zh-CHS: 此时，启动器开始对用户数据报进行身份验证和/或加密。

contents.text: 5.1. Identity_Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1. 身份信息

contents.text: Initiator-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the Value_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器Cookie 16个字节。从值_请求复制。

contents.text: Responder-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the Value_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应器Cookie 16字节。从值_请求复制。

contents.text: Message 4 (Request) or 7 (Response)
contents.zh-CHS: 信息4（请求）或7（响应）

contents.text: LifeTime 3 bytes. The number of seconds remaining before the indicated SPI expires.
contents.zh-CHS: 生存期为3个字节。指示SPI过期前剩余的秒数。

contents.text: When the SPI is zero, this field MUST be filled with a random non-zero value.
contents.zh-CHS: 当SPI为零时，此字段必须填充随机非零值。

contents.text: Security-Parameters-Index (SPI) 4 bytes. The SPI to be used for incoming communications.
contents.zh-CHS: 安全参数索引（SPI）4字节。用于传入通信的SPI。

contents.text: When zero, indicates that no SPI is created in this
contents.zh-CHS: 当为零时，表示此字段中未创建SPI

contents.text: direction.
contents.zh-CHS: 方向

contents.text: Identity-Choice 2 or more bytes. An identity attribute is selected from the list of Offered-Attributes sent by the peer, and is used to calculate the Verification.
contents.zh-CHS: 标识选择2个或更多字节。从对等方发送的提供属性列表中选择标识属性，并用于计算验证。

contents.text: The field may be any integral number of bytes in length, as indicated by its Length field. It does not require any particular alignment. The 16-bit alignment shown is for convenience in the illustration.
contents.zh-CHS: 该字段可以是长度为整数的任何字节数，如其长度字段所示。它不需要任何特定的对齐。图中所示的16位对齐是为了方便起见。

contents.text: Identification Variable Precision Integer, or alternative format indicated by the Identity-Choice. See the "Basic Attributes" for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 标识变量精度整数，或标识选项指示的替代格式。有关详细信息，请参见“基本属性”。

contents.text: The field may be any integral number of bytes in length. It does not require any particular alignment. The 32-bit alignment shown is for convenience in the illustration.
contents.zh-CHS: 该字段的长度可以是任意整数个字节。它不需要任何特定的对齐。图中所示的32位对齐是为了方便起见。

contents.text: Verification Variable Precision Integer, or alternative format indicated by the Identity-Choice. The calculation of the value is described in "Identity Verification".
contents.zh-CHS: 验证变量精度整数，或标识选项指示的替代格式。“身份验证”中描述了该值的计算。

contents.text: The field may be any integral number of bytes in length. It does not require any particular alignment. The 32-bit alignment shown is for convenience in the illustration.
contents.zh-CHS: 该字段的长度可以是任意整数个字节。它不需要任何特定的对齐。图中所示的32位对齐是为了方便起见。

contents.text: Attribute-Choices 0 or more bytes. When the SPI is non-zero, a list of attributes selected from the list of Offered-Attributes supported by the peer.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性选择0个或更多字节。当SPI为非零时，从对等方支持的提供属性列表中选择的属性列表。

contents.text: The contents and usage of this list are further described in "Attribute Choices List". The end of the list is indicated by the UDP Length after removing the Padding (UDP Length - last Padding value).
contents.zh-CHS: 该列表的内容和用法在“属性选择列表”中作了进一步说明。删除填充后的UDP长度（UDP长度-最后一个填充值）指示列表的结尾。

contents.text: Padding 8 to 255 bytes. This field is filled up to at least a 128 byte boundary, measured from the beginning of the message. The number of pad bytes are chosen randomly.
contents.zh-CHS: 填充8到255字节。此字段填充至至少128字节的边界，从消息开始测量。pad字节数是随机选择的。

contents.text: In addition, when a Privacy-Method indicated by the
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，当

contents.text: current Scheme-Choice requires the plaintext to be a multiple of some number of bytes (the block size of a block cipher), this field is adjusted as necessary to the size required by the algorithm.
contents.zh-CHS: 当前方案选择要求明文是某个字节数（分组密码的块大小）的倍数，此字段根据算法要求的大小进行调整。

contents.text: Self-Describing-Padding begins with the value 1. Each byte contains the index of that byte. Thus, the final pad byte indicates the number of pad bytes to remove. For example, when the unpadded message length is 120 bytes, the padding values might be 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8.
contents.zh-CHS: 自描述填充以值1开始。每个字节都包含该字节的索引。因此，最后一个pad字节指示要删除的pad字节数。例如，当未添加的消息长度为120字节时，填充值可能为1、2、3、4、5、6、7和8。

contents.text: The portion of the message after the SPI field is masked using the Privacy-Method indicated by the current Scheme-Choice.
contents.zh-CHS: SPI字段之后的消息部分使用当前方案选择指示的隐私方法屏蔽。

contents.text: The fields following the SPI are opaque. That is, the values are set prior to masking (and optional encryption), and examined only after unmasking (and optional decryption).
contents.zh-CHS: SPI后面的字段是不透明的。也就是说，这些值是在屏蔽（和可选加密）之前设置的，并且仅在取消屏蔽（和可选解密）之后检查。

contents.text: 5.2. Attribute Choices List
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2. 属性选择列表

contents.text: This list specifies the attributes of the SPI. The attribute formats are specified in the "Basic Attributes".
contents.zh-CHS: 此列表指定SPI的属性。属性格式在“基本属性”中指定。

contents.text: The list is composed of one or two sections: Authentication-Attributes, and/or Encapsulation-Attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 该列表由一个或两个部分组成：身份验证属性和/或封装属性。

contents.text: When sending from the SPI User to the SPI Owner, the attributes are processed in the order listed. For example,
contents.zh-CHS: 从SPI用户发送到SPI所有者时，将按列出的顺序处理属性。例如

contents.text: "ESP-Attributes", "Deflate" (Compression), "XOR" (Encryption), "DES-CBC" (Encryption), "XOR" (Encryption), "AH-Attributes", "AH-Sequence", "MD5-IPMAC" (Authentication),
contents.zh-CHS: “ESP属性”、“Deflate”（压缩）、“XOR”（加密）、“DES-CBC”（加密）、“XOR”（加密）、“AH属性”、“AH序列”、“MD5-IPMAC”（身份验证），

contents.text: would result in ESP with compression and triple encryption (inside), and then AH authentication with sequence numbers (outside) of the ESP payload.
contents.zh-CHS: 将导致ESP使用压缩和三重加密（内部），然后使用ESP有效负载的序列号（外部）进行AH身份验证。

contents.text: The SPI Owner will naturally process the datagram in the reverse order.
contents.zh-CHS: SPI所有者自然会以相反的顺序处理数据报。

contents.text: This ordering also affects the order of key generation. Both SPI
contents.zh-CHS: 此顺序还影响密钥生成的顺序。都是SPI

contents.text: Owner and SPI User generate the keys in the order listed.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有者和SPI用户按列出的顺序生成密钥。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: When choices are made from the list of Offered-Attributes, it is not required that any Security Association include every kind of offered attribute in any single SPI, or that a separate SPI be created for every offered attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 当从提供的属性列表中进行选择时，不要求任何安全关联在任何单个SPI中包含每种提供的属性，也不要求为每个提供的属性创建单独的SPI。

contents.text: Some kinds of attributes may be included more than once in a single SPI. The set of allowable combinations of attributes are dependent on implementation and operational policy. Such considerations are outside the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 某些类型的属性可能在单个SPI中包含多次。允许的属性组合集取决于实施和操作策略。此类考虑不在本文件的范围内。

contents.text: The list may be divided into additional sections. This can occur only when both parties recognize the affected attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 该清单可分为其他部分。只有当双方都认识到受影响的属性时，才会发生这种情况。

contents.text: The authentication, compression, encryption and identification mechanisms chosen, as well as the encapsulation modes (if any), need not be the same in both directions.
contents.zh-CHS: 选择的身份验证、压缩、加密和标识机制以及封装模式（如果有）在两个方向上不必相同。

contents.text: 5.3. Shared-Secret
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3. 共享秘密

contents.text: A shared-secret is used in a number of calculations. Regardless of the internal representation of the shared-secret, when used in calculations it is in the same form as the Value part of a Variable Precision Integer:
contents.zh-CHS: 在许多计算中使用共享秘密。无论共享机密的内部表示形式如何，在计算中使用时，它与可变精度整数的值部分的形式相同：

contents.text: - most significant byte first. - bits used are right justified within byte boundaries. - any unused bits are in the most significant byte. - unused bits are zero filled.
contents.zh-CHS: - 最高有效字节在前。-使用的位在字节边界内右对齐。-任何未使用的位都在最高有效字节中。-未使用的位是零填充的。

contents.text: The shared-secret does not include a Size field.
contents.zh-CHS: 共享机密不包括大小字段。

contents.text: 5.4. Identity Verification
contents.zh-CHS: 5.4. 身份验证

contents.text: These messages are authenticated using the Identity-Choice. The Verification value is calculated prior to masking (and optional encryption), and verified after unmasking (and optional decryption).
contents.zh-CHS: 使用标识选项对这些消息进行身份验证。验证值在屏蔽（和可选加密）之前计算，在取消屏蔽（和可选解密）之后验证。

contents.text: The Identity-Choice authentication function is supplied with two input values:
contents.zh-CHS: Identity Choice身份验证功能提供了两个输入值：

contents.text: - the sender (SPI Owner) verification-key, - the data to be verified (as a concatenated sequence of bytes).
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送方（SPI所有者）验证密钥，-要验证的数据（作为串联的字节序列）。

contents.text: The resulting output value is stored in the Verification field.
contents.zh-CHS: 结果输出值存储在验证字段中。

contents.text: The Identity-Choice verification data consists of the following concatenated values:
contents.zh-CHS: 标识选择验证数据由以下串联值组成：

contents.text: + the Initiator Cookie, + the Responder Cookie, + the Message, LifeTime and SPI fields, + the Identity-Choice and Identification, + the SPI User Identity Verification (response only), + the Attribute-Choices following the Verification field, + the Padding, + the SPI Owner TBV, + the SPI Owner Exchange-Value, + the SPI Owner Offered-Attributes, + the SPI User TBV, + the SPI User Exchange-Value, + the SPI User Offered-Attributes, + the Responder Offered-Schemes.
contents.zh-CHS: + 发起方Cookie、+响应方Cookie、+消息、生存期和SPI字段、+身份选择和标识、+SPI用户身份验证（仅响应）、+验证字段后面的属性选择、+填充、+SPI所有者TBV、+SPI所有者交换值、+SPI所有者提供的属性，+SPI用户TBV、+SPI用户交换值、+SPI用户提供的属性、+响应者提供的方案。

contents.text: The TBV (Three Byte Value) consists of the Counter and Scheme-Choice fields from the Value_Request, or the Reserved field from the Value_Response, immediately preceding the associated Exchange-Value.
contents.zh-CHS: TBV（三字节值）由Value_请求中的计数器和方案选择字段或Value_响应中的保留字段组成，紧跟在相关交换值之前。

contents.text: Note that the order of the Exchange-Value and Offered-Attributes fields is different in each direction, and the Identification and SPI fields are also likely to be different in each direction. Note also that the SPI User Identity Verification (from the Identity_Request) is present only in the Identity_Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，交换值和提供的属性字段在每个方向上的顺序不同，标识字段和SPI字段在每个方向上也可能不同。还要注意，SPI用户身份验证（来自Identity_请求）仅存在于Identity_响应中。

contents.text: If the verification fails, the users are notified, and a Verification_Failure message is sent, without adding any SPI. On success, normal operation begins with the authentication and/or encryption of user datagrams.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果验证失败，将通知用户，并发送验证失败消息，而不添加任何SPI。成功后，正常操作从用户数据报的身份验证和/或加密开始。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: This is distinct from any authentication method specified for the SPI.
contents.zh-CHS: 这不同于为SPI指定的任何身份验证方法。

contents.text: The exact details of the Identification and verification-key included in the Verification calculation are dependent on the Identity-Choice, as described in the "Basic Attributes".
contents.zh-CHS: 验证计算中包含的标识和验证密钥的确切细节取决于“基本属性”中描述的身份选择。

contents.text: Each party may wish to keep their own trusted databases, such as the Pretty Good Privacy (PGP) web of trust, and accept only those identities found there. Failure to find the Identification in either an internal or external database results in the same
contents.zh-CHS: 各方可能希望保留自己的受信任数据库，例如相当好的隐私（PGP）信任网，并且只接受在那里找到的身份。在内部或外部数据库中找不到标识会导致相同的结果

contents.text: Verification_Failure message as failure of the verification computation.
contents.zh-CHS: 验证\验证计算失败的失败消息。

contents.text: The Exchange-Value data includes both the Size and Value fields. The Offered-Attributes and Attribute-Choices data includes the Attribute, Length and Value fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 交换值数据包括大小和值字段。提供的属性和属性选择数据包括属性、长度和值字段。

contents.text: 5.5. Privacy-Key Computation
contents.zh-CHS: 5.5. 隐私密钥计算

contents.text: Identification Exchange messages are masked using the Privacy-Method indicated by the current Scheme-Choice. Masking begins with the next field after the SPI, and continues to the end of the data indicated by the UDP Length, including the Padding.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用当前方案选择指示的隐私方法屏蔽身份交换消息。屏蔽从SPI之后的下一个字段开始，并继续到UDP长度所指示的数据的末尾，包括填充。

contents.text: The Scheme-Choice specified Key-Generation-Function is used to create a special privacy-key for each message. This function is calculated over the following concatenated values:
contents.zh-CHS: Scheme Choice指定的密钥生成函数用于为每条消息创建特殊的隐私密钥。此函数通过以下串联值进行计算：

contents.text: + the SPI Owner Exchange-Value, + the SPI User Exchange-Value, + the Initiator Cookie, + the Responder Cookie, + the Message, LifeTime and SPI (or Reserved) fields, + the computed shared-secret.
contents.zh-CHS: + SPI所有者交换值、+SPI用户交换值、+Initiator Cookie、+Responder Cookie、+Message、LifeTime和SPI（或Reserved）字段、+computed shared secret。

contents.text: Since the order of the Exchange-Value fields is different in each direction, and the Message, LifeTime and SPI fields are also different in each direction, the resulting privacy-key will usually be different in each direction.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于交换值字段在每个方向上的顺序不同，消息、生存期和SPI字段在每个方向上也不同，因此生成的隐私密钥通常在每个方向上都不同。

contents.text: When a larger number of keying-bits are needed than are available from one iteration of the specified Key-Generation-Function, more keying-bits are generated by duplicating the trailing shared-secret, and recalculating the function. That is, the first iteration will have one trailing copy of the shared-secret, the second iteration will have two trailing copies of the shared-secret, and so forth.
contents.zh-CHS: 当需要的键控比特数大于指定密钥生成函数的一次迭代中可用的数目时，通过复制尾部共享密钥并重新计算该函数将生成更多的键控比特。也就是说，第一次迭代将有一个共享秘密的后续副本，第二次迭代将有两个共享秘密的后续副本，依此类推。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: This is distinct from any encryption method specified for the SPI.
