contents.zh-CHS: 这不同于为SPI指定的任何加密方法。

contents.text: The length of the Padding, and other details, are dependent on the Privacy-Method. See the "Basic Privacy-Method" list for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 填充的长度和其他细节取决于隐私方法。有关详细信息，请参见“基本隐私方法”列表。

contents.text: To avoid keeping the Exchange-Values in memory after the initial verification, it is often possible to pre-compute the function over the initial bytes of the concatenated data values for each
contents.zh-CHS: 为了避免在初始验证后将交换值保留在内存中，通常可以在每个值的串联数据值的初始字节上预计算函数

contents.text: direction, and append the trailing copies of the shared-secret.
contents.zh-CHS: 方向，并附加共享机密的后续副本。

contents.text: The Exchange-Value data includes both the Size and Value fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 交换值数据包括大小和值字段。

contents.text: 5.6. Session-Key Computation
contents.zh-CHS: 5.6. 会话密钥计算

contents.text: Each SPI has one or more session-keys. These keys are generated based on the attributes of the SPI. See the "Basic Attributes" for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个SPI都有一个或多个会话密钥。这些键是基于SPI的属性生成的。有关详细信息，请参见“基本属性”。

contents.text: The Scheme-Choice specified Key-Generation-Function is used to create the SPI session-key for that particular attribute. This function is calculated over the following concatenated values:
contents.zh-CHS: Scheme Choice指定的密钥生成函数用于为该特定属性创建SPI会话密钥。此函数通过以下串联值进行计算：

contents.text: + the Initiator Cookie, + the Responder Cookie, + the SPI Owner generation-key, + the SPI User generation-key, + the message Verification field, + the computed shared-secret.
contents.zh-CHS: + 发起方Cookie、+响应方Cookie、+SPI所有者生成密钥、+SPI用户生成密钥、+消息验证字段、+计算的共享密钥。

contents.text: Since the order of the generation-keys is different in each direction, and the Verification field is also likely to be different in each direction, the resulting session-key will usually be different in each direction.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于生成密钥的顺序在每个方向上不同，并且验证字段在每个方向上也可能不同，因此产生的会话密钥通常在每个方向上不同。

contents.text: When a larger number of keying-bits are needed than are available from one iteration of the specified Key-Generation-Function, more keying-bits are generated by duplicating the trailing shared-secret, and recalculating the function. That is, the first iteration will have one trailing copy of the shared-secret, the second iteration will have two trailing copies of the shared-secret, and so forth.
contents.zh-CHS: 当需要的键控比特数大于指定密钥生成函数的一次迭代中可用的数目时，通过复制尾部共享密钥并重新计算该函数将生成更多的键控比特。也就是说，第一次迭代将有一个共享秘密的后续副本，第二次迭代将有两个共享秘密的后续副本，依此类推。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: This is distinct from any privacy-key generated for the Photuris exchange. Different initialization data is used, and iterations are maintained separately.
contents.zh-CHS: 这不同于为Photuris exchange生成的任何隐私密钥。使用不同的初始化数据，并分别维护迭代。

contents.text: The exact details of the Verification field and generation-keys that are included in the session-key calculation are dependent on the Identity-Choices, as described in the "Basic Attributes".
contents.zh-CHS: 会话密钥计算中包含的验证字段和生成密钥的确切细节取决于标识选择，如“基本属性”中所述。

contents.text: To avoid keeping the generation-keys in memory after the initial verification, it is often possible to pre-compute the function over the initial bytes of the concatenated data values for each direction, and append the trailing copies of the shared-secret.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了避免在初始验证后将生成密钥保留在内存中，通常可以在每个方向的串联数据值的初始字节上预计算函数，并附加共享密钥的后续副本。

contents.text: When both authentication and encryption attributes are used for the same SPI, there may be multiple session-keys associated with the same SPI. These session-keys are generated in the order of the Attribute-Choices list.
contents.zh-CHS: 当身份验证和加密属性都用于同一SPI时，可能有多个会话密钥与同一SPI关联。这些会话键按属性选项列表的顺序生成。

contents.text: 6. SPI Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 6. SPI消息

contents.text:
SPI User                             SPI Owner
========                             =========
SPI_Needed                     ->
   list SPI attribute(s)
   make validity key
   authenticate
   make privacy key(s)
   mask/encrypt message
                                <-   SPI_Update
                                        make SPI
                                        pick SPI attribute(s)
                                        make SPI session-key(s)
                                        make validity key
                                        authenticate
                                        make privacy key(s)
                                        mask/encrypt message
The exchange of messages is not related to the Initiator and Responder. Instead, either party may send one of these messages at any time. The messages are easily distinguished by the parties.
contents.zh-CHS: 消息交换与启动器和响应程序无关。相反，任何一方都可以随时发送其中一条消息。双方很容易区分这些信息。

contents.text: 6.0.1. Send SPI_Needed
contents.zh-CHS: 6.0.1. 根据需要发送SPI_

contents.text: At any time after completion of the Identification Exchange, either party can send SPI_Needed. This message is sent when a prospective SPI User needs particular attributes for a datagram (such as confidentiality), and no current SPI has those attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 在完成身份交换后的任何时候，任何一方均可根据需要发送SPI_。当潜在SPI用户需要数据报的特定属性（如机密性）且当前SPI没有这些属性时，将发送此消息。

contents.text: The prospective SPI User selects from the intersection of attributes that both parties have previously offered, calculates the Verification, and masks the message using the Privacy-Method indicated by the current Scheme-Choice.
contents.zh-CHS: 潜在SPI用户从双方先前提供的属性的交集中选择，计算验证，并使用当前方案选择指示的隐私方法屏蔽消息。

contents.text: 6.0.2. Receive SPI_Needed
contents.zh-CHS: 6.0.2. 接收所需的SPI_

contents.text: The potential SPI Owner validates the pair of Cookies, the Padding, the Verification, and the Attributes-Needed.
contents.zh-CHS: 潜在的SPI所有者验证cookie对、填充、验证和所需的属性。

contents.text: - When an invalid/expired cookie is detected, a Bad_Cookie message is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当检测到无效/过期的cookie时，将发送一条坏cookie消息。

contents.text: - When too many SPI values are already in use for this particular peer, or some other resource limit is reached, a Resource_Limit message is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当太多SPI值已用于此特定对等方，或达到某些其他资源限制时，将发送资源限制消息。

contents.text: - After unmasking, when invalid Padding is detected, the variable length Attributes-Needed do not match the UDP Length, or an attribute was not in the Offered-Attributes, the message is silently discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: - 取消屏蔽后，当检测到无效填充、所需的可变长度属性与UDP长度不匹配，或者提供的属性中没有属性时，消息将被静默丢弃。

contents.text: - When the message verification fails, a Verification_Failure message is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当消息验证失败时，将发送验证失败消息。

contents.text: - Whenever such a problem is detected, the SPI is not established; the implementation SHOULD log the occurance, and notify an operator as appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: - 每当检测到此类问题时，不建立SPI；实施应记录发生的情况，并酌情通知操作员。

contents.text: When the message is valid, the party SHOULD send SPI_Update with the necessary attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 当消息有效时，参与方应发送带有必要属性的SPI_更新。

contents.text: If an existing SPI has those attributes, that SPI is returned in the SPI_Update with the remaining SPILT.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果现有SPI具有这些属性，则该SPI将在SPI_更新中与剩余的SPI一起返回。

contents.text: 6.0.3. Send SPI_Update
contents.zh-CHS: 6.0.3. 发送SPI_更新

contents.text: At any time after completion of the Identification Exchange, either party can send SPI_Update. This message has effect in only one direction, from the SPI Owner to the SPI User.
contents.zh-CHS: 在完成身份交换后的任何时候，任何一方都可以发送SPI_更新。此消息仅在一个方向上有效，即从SPI所有者到SPI用户。

contents.text: The SPI Owner chooses the SPI and SPILT, a set of Attributes for the SPI, calculates the Verification, and masks the message using the Privacy-Method indicated by the current Scheme-Choice.
contents.zh-CHS: SPI所有者选择SPI和SPILT（SPI的一组属性），计算验证，并使用当前方案选择指示的隐私方法屏蔽消息。

contents.text: 6.0.4. Receive SPI_Update
contents.zh-CHS: 6.0.4. 接收SPI_更新

contents.text: The prospective SPI User validates the pair of Cookies, the Padding, the Verification, and the Attributes-Needed.
contents.zh-CHS: 潜在的SPI用户验证cookie对、填充、验证和所需的属性。

contents.text: - When an invalid/expired cookie is detected, a Bad_Cookie message
contents.zh-CHS: - 当检测到无效/过期的cookie时，将显示一条坏的\u cookie消息

contents.text: is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: 他被派去了。

contents.text: - After unmasking, when invalid Padding is detected, the variable length Attribute-Choices do not match the UDP Length, an attribute was not in the Offered-Attributes, or the message modifies an existing SPI, the message is silently discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: - 取消屏蔽后，当检测到无效填充、可变长度属性选项与UDP长度不匹配、属性不在提供的属性中或消息修改了现有SPI时，消息将自动丢弃。

contents.text: - When the message verification fails, a Verification_Failure message is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当消息验证失败时，将发送验证失败消息。

contents.text: - Whenever such a problem is detected, the SPI is not established; the implementation SHOULD log the occurance, and notify an operator as appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: - 每当检测到此类问题时，不建立SPI；实施应记录发生的情况，并酌情通知操作员。

contents.text: When the message is valid, further actions are dependent on the value of the LifeTime field, as described later.
contents.zh-CHS: 当消息有效时，进一步的操作取决于LifeTime字段的值，如下所述。

contents.text: 6.0.5. Automated SPI_Updates
contents.zh-CHS: 6.0.5. 自动SPI_更新

contents.text: Each SPI requires replacement under several circumstances:
contents.zh-CHS: 在以下几种情况下，每个SPI都需要更换：

contents.text: - the volume of data processed (inhibiting probability cryptanalysis),
contents.zh-CHS: - 处理的数据量（抑制概率密码分析），

contents.text: - exhaustion of available anti-replay Sequence Numbers,
contents.zh-CHS: - 耗尽可用的反重放序列号，

contents.text: - and expiration of the LifeTime.
contents.zh-CHS: - 生命的尽头。

contents.text: In general, a determination is made upon receipt of a datagram. If the transform specific processing finds that refreshment is needed, an automated SPI_Update is triggered.
contents.zh-CHS: 通常，在收到数据报时进行确定。如果特定于转换的处理发现需要刷新，则会触发自动SPI_更新。

contents.text: In addition, automated SPI_Updates allow rapid SPI refreshment for high bandwidth applications in a high delay environment. The update messages flow in the opposite direction from the primary traffic, conserving bandwidth and avoiding service interruption.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，自动SPI_更新允许在高延迟环境中对高带宽应用程序进行快速SPI刷新。更新消息以与主流量相反的方向流动，节省了带宽并避免了服务中断。

contents.text: When creating each SPI, the implementation MAY optionally set an Update TimeOut (UTO); by default, to half the value of the LifeTime (SPILT/2). This time is highly dynamic, and adjustable to provide an automated SPI_Update long before transform specific processing. If no new Photuris exchange occurs within the time limit, and the current exchange state has not expired, an automated SPI_Update is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: 当创建每个SPI时，实现可以选择性地设置更新超时（UTO）；默认情况下，设置为生存期值的一半（SPILT/2）。这段时间是高度动态的，并且可以调整，以在转换特定处理之前很久提供自动SPI_更新。如果在时间限制内未发生新的Photuris交换，且当前交换状态尚未过期，则会发送自动SPI_更新。

contents.text: 6.1. SPI_Needed
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1. 需要SPI_

contents.text: Initiator-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the Value_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器Cookie 16个字节。从值_请求复制。

contents.text: Responder-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the Value_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应器Cookie 16字节。从值_请求复制。

contents.text: Message 8
contents.zh-CHS: 信息8

contents.text: Reserved-LT 3 bytes. For future use; MUST be filled with a random non-zero value when transmitted, and MUST be ignored when received.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留LT 3字节。供日后使用；传输时必须用随机非零值填充，接收时必须忽略。

contents.text: Reserved-SPI 4 bytes. For future use; MUST be set to zero when transmitted, and MUST be ignored when received.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留SPI 4字节。供日后使用；传输时必须设置为零，接收时必须忽略。

contents.text: Verification Variable Precision Integer, or other format indicated by the current Scheme-Choice. The calculation of the value is described in "Validity Verification".
contents.zh-CHS: 验证变量精度整数，或当前方案选择指示的其他格式。“有效性验证”中描述了该值的计算。

contents.text: The field may be any integral number of bytes in length. It does not require any particular alignment. The 32-bit alignment shown is for convenience in the illustration.
contents.zh-CHS: 该字段的长度可以是任意整数个字节。它不需要任何特定的对齐。图中所示的32位对齐是为了方便起见。

contents.text: Attributes-Needed 4 or more bytes. A list of two or more attributes, selected from the list of Offered-Attributes supported by the peer.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性需要4个或更多字节。从对等方支持的提供属性列表中选择的两个或多个属性的列表。

contents.text: The contents and usage of this list are as previously described in "Attribute Choices List". The end of the list is indicated by the UDP Length after removing the Padding (UDP Length - last Padding value).
contents.zh-CHS: 此列表的内容和用法如前面“属性选择列表”中所述。删除填充后的UDP长度（UDP长度-最后一个填充值）指示列表的结尾。

contents.text: Padding 8 or more bytes. The message is padded in the same fashion specified for Identification Exchange messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 填充8个或更多字节。消息的填充方式与为标识交换消息指定的填充方式相同。

contents.text: The portion of the message after the SPI field is masked using the Privacy-Method indicated by the current Scheme-Choice.
contents.zh-CHS: SPI字段之后的消息部分使用当前方案选择指示的隐私方法屏蔽。

contents.text: The fields following the SPI are opaque. That is, the values are set prior to masking (and optional encryption), and examined only after unmasking (and optional decryption).
contents.zh-CHS: SPI后面的字段是不透明的。也就是说，这些值是在屏蔽（和可选加密）之前设置的，并且仅在取消屏蔽（和可选解密）之后检查。

contents.text: 6.2. SPI_Update
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2. SPI_更新

contents.text: Initiator-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the Value_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器Cookie 16个字节。从值_请求复制。

contents.text: Responder-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the Value_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应器Cookie 16字节。从值_请求复制。

contents.text: Message 9
contents.zh-CHS: 信息9

contents.text: LifeTime 3 bytes. The number of seconds remaining before the indicated SPI expires. The value zero indicates deletion of the indicated SPI.
contents.zh-CHS: 生存期为3个字节。指示SPI过期前剩余的秒数。值0表示删除了指定的SPI。

contents.text: Security-Parameters-Index (SPI) 4 bytes. The SPI to be used for incoming communications.
contents.zh-CHS: 安全参数索引（SPI）4字节。用于传入通信的SPI。

contents.text: This may be a new SPI value (for creation), or an existing SPI value (for deletion). The value zero indicates special processing.
contents.zh-CHS: 这可能是新的SPI值（用于创建），也可能是现有的SPI值（用于删除）。值为零表示特殊处理。

contents.text: Verification Variable Precision Integer, or other format indicated by the current Scheme-Choice. The calculation of the value is described in "Validity Verification".
contents.zh-CHS: 验证变量精度整数，或当前方案选择指示的其他格式。“有效性验证”中描述了该值的计算。

contents.text: The field may be any integral number of bytes in length. It does not require any particular alignment. The 32-bit alignment shown is for convenience in the illustration.
contents.zh-CHS: 该字段的长度可以是任意整数个字节。它不需要任何特定的对齐。图中所示的32位对齐是为了方便起见。

contents.text: Attribute-Choices 0 or more bytes. When the SPI and SPILT are non-zero, a list of attributes selected from the list of Offered-Attributes supported by the peer.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性选择0个或更多字节。当SPI和SPILT为非零时，从对等方支持的提供属性列表中选择的属性列表。

contents.text: The contents and usage of this list are as previously described in "Attribute Choices List". The end of the list is indicated by the UDP Length after removing the Padding (UDP Length - last Padding value).
contents.zh-CHS: 此列表的内容和用法如前面“属性选择列表”中所述。删除填充后的UDP长度（UDP长度-最后一个填充值）指示列表的结尾。

contents.text: Padding 8 or more bytes. The message is padded in the same fashion specified for Identification Exchange messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 填充8个或更多字节。消息的填充方式与为标识交换消息指定的填充方式相同。

contents.text: The portion of the message after the SPI field is masked using the Privacy-Method indicated by the current Scheme-Choice.
contents.zh-CHS: SPI字段之后的消息部分使用当前方案选择指示的隐私方法屏蔽。

contents.text: The fields following the SPI are opaque. That is, the values are set prior to masking (and optional encryption), and examined only after unmasking (and optional decryption).
contents.zh-CHS: SPI后面的字段是不透明的。也就是说，这些值是在屏蔽（和可选加密）之前设置的，并且仅在取消屏蔽（和可选解密）之后检查。

contents.text: 6.2.1. Creation
When the LifeTime is non-zero, and the SPI is also non-zero, the SPI_Update can be used to create a new SPI. When the SPI is zero, the SPI_Update is silently discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 当生存期为非零且SPI也为非零时，可以使用SPI_更新来创建新的SPI。当SPI为零时，SPI_更新会自动丢弃。

contents.text: The new session-keys are calculated in the same fashion as the Identity_Messages. Since the SPI value is always different than any previous SPI during the Exchange LifeTime of the shared-secret, the resulting session-keys will necessarily be different from all others used in the same direction.
contents.zh-CHS: 新会话密钥的计算方式与Identity_消息相同。由于在共享密钥的交换生存期内，SPI值始终不同于任何先前的SPI，因此产生的会话密钥必然不同于在同一方向上使用的所有其他会话密钥。

contents.text: No retransmission timer is necessary. Success is indicated by the peer use of the new SPI.
contents.zh-CHS: 无需重新传输计时器。同行使用新的SPI表示成功。

contents.text: Should all creation attempts fail, eventually the peer will find that all existing SPIs have expired, and will begin the Photuris exchange again by sending a new Cookie_Request. When appropriate, this Cookie_Request MAY include a Responder-Cookie to retain previous party pairings.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果所有创建尝试失败，最终对等方将发现所有现有SPI都已过期，并通过发送新的Cookie_请求再次开始Photuris交换。适当时，此Cookie_请求可能包括一个响应者Cookie，以保留以前的参与方配对。

contents.text: 6.2.2. Deletion

When the LifeTime is zero, the SPI_Update can be used to delete a single existing SPI. When the SPI is also zero, the SPI_Update will delete all existing SPIs related to this Security Association, and mark the Photuris exchange state as expired. This is especially useful when the application that needed them terminates.
contents.zh-CHS: 当生存期为零时，SPI_更新可用于删除单个现有SPI。当SPI也为零时，SPI_更新将删除与此安全关联相关的所有现有SPI，并将Photuris exchange状态标记为过期。当需要它们的应用程序终止时，这尤其有用。

contents.text: No retransmission timer is necessary. This message is advisory, to reduce the number of ICMP Security Failures messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 无需重新传输计时器。此消息为建议消息，用于减少ICMP安全故障消息的数量。

contents.text: Should any deletion attempts fail, the peer will learn that the deleted SPIs are invalid through the normal ICMP Security Failures messages, and will initiate a Photuris exchange by sending a new Cookie_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果任何删除尝试失败，对等方将通过正常的ICMP安全故障消息得知已删除的SPI无效，并通过发送新的Cookie_请求启动Photuris交换。

contents.text: 6.2.3. Modification
The SPI_Update cannot be used to modify existing SPIs, such as lengthen an existing SPI LifeTime, resurrect an expired SPI, or add/remove an Attribute-Choice.
contents.zh-CHS: SPI_更新不能用于修改现有SPI，例如延长现有SPI生存期、恢复过期SPI或添加/删除属性选择。

contents.text: On receipt, such an otherwise valid message is silently discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 在接收时，这样一个原本有效的消息会被悄悄地丢弃。

contents.text: 6.3. Validity Verification
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3. 有效性验证

contents.text: These messages are authenticated using the Validity-Method indicated by the current Scheme-Choice. The Verification value is calculated prior to masking (and optional encryption), and verified after unmasking (and optional decryption).
contents.zh-CHS: 使用当前方案选择指示的有效性方法对这些消息进行身份验证。验证值在屏蔽（和可选加密）之前计算，在取消屏蔽（和可选解密）之后验证。

contents.text: The Validity-Method authentication function is supplied with two input values:
contents.zh-CHS: Validity Method authentication函数提供了两个输入值：

contents.text: - the sender (SPI Owner) verification-key, - the data to be verified (as a concatenated sequence of bytes).
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送方（SPI所有者）验证密钥，-要验证的数据（作为串联的字节序列）。

contents.text: The resulting output value is stored in the Verification field.
contents.zh-CHS: 结果输出值存储在验证字段中。

contents.text: The Validity-Method verification data consists of the following concatenated values:
contents.zh-CHS: 有效性方法验证数据由以下串联值组成：

contents.text: + the Initiator Cookie, + the Responder Cookie, + the Message, LifeTime and SPI (or Reserved) fields, + the SPI Owner Identity Verification, + the SPI User Identity Verification, + the Attribute-Choices following the Verification field, + the Padding.
contents.zh-CHS: + 发起方Cookie、+响应方Cookie、+消息、生存期和SPI（或保留）字段、+SPI所有者身份验证、+SPI用户身份验证、+验证字段后面的属性选择、+填充。

contents.text: Note that the order of the Identity Verification fields (from the Identity_Messages) is different in each direction, and the Message, LifeTime and SPI fields are also likely to be different in each direction.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，身份验证字段（来自Identity_消息）的顺序在每个方向上都不同，消息、生存期和SPI字段在每个方向上也可能不同。

contents.text: If the verification fails, the users are notified, and a Verification_Failure message is sent, without adding or deleting any SPIs. On success, normal operation begins with the authentication and/or encryption of user datagrams.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果验证失败，将通知用户，并发送验证失败消息，而不添加或删除任何SPI。成功后，正常操作从用户数据报的身份验证和/或加密开始。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: This is distinct from any authentication method specified for the SPI.
contents.zh-CHS: 这不同于为SPI指定的任何身份验证方法。

contents.text: The Identity Verification data includes both the Size and Value fields. The Attribute-Choices data includes the Attribute, Length and Value fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证数据包括大小和值字段。属性选择数据包括属性、长度和值字段。

contents.text: 7. Error Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 错误消息

contents.text: These messages are issued in response to Photuris state loss or other problems. A message has effect in only one direction. No retransmission timer is necessary.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些消息是针对Photuris状态丢失或其他问题发出的。消息仅在一个方向上有效。无需重新传输计时器。

contents.text: These messages are not masked.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些消息没有被屏蔽。

contents.text: The receiver checks the Cookies for validity. Special care MUST be taken that the Cookie pair in the Error Message actually match a pair currently in use, and that the protocol is currently in a state where such an Error Message might be expected. Otherwise, these messages could provide an opportunity for a denial of service attack. Invalid messages are silently discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 接收者检查Cookies的有效性。必须特别注意，错误消息中的Cookie对实际上与当前正在使用的Cookie对匹配，并且协议当前处于可能会出现此类错误消息的状态。否则，这些消息可能会提供拒绝服务攻击的机会。无效消息将被自动丢弃。

contents.text: 7.1. Bad_Cookie
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1. 坏饼干

contents.text: For the format of the 33 byte message, see "Header Format". There are no additional fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关33字节信息的格式，请参阅“标题格式”。没有其他字段。

contents.text: Initiator-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the offending message.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器Cookie 16个字节。从有问题的消息中复制。

contents.text: Responder-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the offending message.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应器Cookie 16字节。从有问题的消息中复制。

contents.text: Message 10
contents.zh-CHS: 信息10

contents.text: This error message is sent when a Value_Request, Identity_Request, SPI_Needed, or SPI_Update is received, and the receiver specific Cookie is invalid or the associated exchange state has expired.
contents.zh-CHS: 当收到值请求、标识请求、需要SPI\u或SPI\u更新，并且特定于接收器的Cookie无效或关联的交换状态已过期时，将发送此错误消息。

contents.text: During the Photuris exchange, when this error message is received, it has no immediate effect on the operation of the protocol phases. Later, when Retransmissions have been exceeded, and this error message has been received, the Initiator SHOULD begin the Photuris exchange again by sending a new Cookie_Request with the Responder-Cookie and Counter updated appropriately.
contents.zh-CHS: 在Photuris交换期间，当收到此错误消息时，它不会立即影响协议阶段的操作。稍后，当超过重新传输时，并且已收到此错误消息，发起方应通过发送带有响应方Cookie的新Cookie_请求并适当更新计数器，再次开始Photuris交换。

contents.text: When this error message is received in response to SPI_Needed, the exchange state SHOULD NOT be marked as expired, but the party SHOULD initiate a Photuris exchange by sending a new Cookie_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 当收到此错误消息以响应所需的SPI_时，交换状态不应标记为已过期，但该方应通过发送新的Cookie_请求来启动Photuris交换。

contents.text: When this error message is received in response to SPI_Update, the exchange state SHOULD NOT be marked as expired, and no further action is taken. A new exchange will be initiated later when needed by the peer to send authenticated and/or encrypted data.
contents.zh-CHS: 当收到此错误消息以响应SPI_更新时，不应将exchange状态标记为已过期，并且不会采取进一步的操作。稍后，当对等方需要发送经过验证和/或加密的数据时，将启动新的交换。

contents.text: Existing SPIs are not deleted. They expire normally, and are purged sometime later.
contents.zh-CHS: 现有SPI不会被删除。它们通常会过期，稍后会被清除。

contents.text: 7.2. Resource_Limit
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2. 资源限制

contents.text: For the format of the 34 byte message, see "Cookie_Request". There are no additional fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关34字节消息的格式，请参阅“Cookie_请求”。没有其他字段。

contents.text: Initiator-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the offending message.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器Cookie 16个字节。从有问题的消息中复制。

contents.text: Responder-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the offending message.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应器Cookie 16字节。从有问题的消息中复制。

contents.text: Special processing is applied to a Cookie_Request. When the offending message Responder-Cookie and Counter were both zero, and an existing exchange has not yet been purged, this field is replaced with the
contents.zh-CHS: 对Cookie\u请求应用特殊处理。当有问题的消息响应程序Cookie和计数器均为零，并且现有的exchange尚未清除时，此字段将替换为

contents.text: Responder-Cookie from the existing exchange.
contents.zh-CHS: 来自现有exchange的响应程序Cookie。

contents.text: Message 11
contents.zh-CHS: 信息11

contents.text: Counter 1 byte. Copied from the offending message.
contents.zh-CHS: 计数器1字节。从有问题的消息中复制。

contents.text: When zero, the Responder-Cookie indicates the Initiator of a previous exchange, or no previous exchange is specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 当为零时，响应器Cookie表示先前交换的发起方，或者未指定先前交换。

contents.text: When non-zero, the Responder-Cookie indicates the Responder to a previous exchange. This value is set to the Counter from the corresponding Cookie_Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 当非零时，响应者Cookie指示前一次交换的响应者。此值设置为相应Cookie_响应中的计数器。

contents.text: This error message is sent when a Cookie_Request, Value_Request or SPI_Needed is received, and too many SPI values are already in use for that peer, or some other Photuris resource is unavailable.
contents.zh-CHS: 当收到Cookie\u请求、Value\u请求或所需SPI\u，并且该对等方已经使用了太多SPI值，或者某些其他Photuris资源不可用时，将发送此错误消息。

contents.text: During the Photuris exchange, when this error message is received in response to a Cookie_Request or Value_Request, the implementation SHOULD double the retransmission timeout (as usual) for sending another Cookie_Request or Value_Request. Otherwise, it has no immediate effect on the operation of the protocol phases. Later, when Retransmissions have been exceeded, and this error message has been received, the Initiator SHOULD begin the Photuris exchange again by sending a new Cookie_Request with the Responder-Cookie and Counter updated appropriately.
contents.zh-CHS: 在Photuris交换期间，当收到响应Cookie_请求或Value_请求的此错误消息时，实现应将发送另一个Cookie_请求或Value_请求的重传超时（通常）增加一倍。否则，它不会立即影响协议阶段的操作。稍后，当超过重新传输时，并且已收到此错误消息，发起方应通过发送带有响应方Cookie的新Cookie_请求并适当更新计数器，再次开始Photuris交换。

contents.text: When this error message is received in response to SPI_Needed, the implementation SHOULD NOT send another SPI_Needed until one of the existing SPIs associated with this exchange is deleted or has expired.
contents.zh-CHS: 当收到此错误消息以响应需要的SPI_时，在与此交换关联的现有SPI之一被删除或过期之前，实现不应发送另一个需要的SPI_。

contents.text: 7.3. Verification_Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3. 验证失败

contents.text: For the format of the 33 byte message, see "Header Format". There are no additional fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关33字节信息的格式，请参阅“标题格式”。没有其他字段。

contents.text: Initiator-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the offending message.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器Cookie 16个字节。从有问题的消息中复制。

contents.text: Responder-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the offending message.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应器Cookie 16字节。从有问题的消息中复制。

contents.text: Message 12
contents.zh-CHS: 信息12

contents.text: This error message is sent when an Identity_Message, SPI_Needed or SPI_Update is received, and verification fails.
contents.zh-CHS: 当收到标识信息、需要SPI信息或SPI更新信息且验证失败时，将发送此错误信息。

contents.text: When this error message is received, the implementation SHOULD log the occurance, and notify an operator as appropriate. However, receipt has no effect on the operation of the protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 收到此错误消息后，实现应记录发生的情况，并酌情通知操作员。但是，接收对协议的运行没有影响。

contents.text: 7.4. Message_Reject
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4. 拒绝消息

contents.text: Initiator-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the offending message.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器Cookie 16个字节。从有问题的消息中复制。

contents.text: Responder-Cookie 16 bytes. Copied from the offending message.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应器Cookie 16字节。从有问题的消息中复制。

contents.text: Message 13
contents.zh-CHS: 信息13

contents.text: Bad-Message 1 byte. Indicates the Message number of the offending message.
contents.zh-CHS: 错误消息1字节。指示有问题消息的消息编号。

contents.text: Offset 2 bytes. The number of bytes from the beginning of the offending message where the unrecognized field starts. The minimum value is 32.
contents.zh-CHS: 偏移量为2字节。从不可识别字段开始的出错消息开始的字节数。最小值为32。

contents.text: This error message is sent when an optional Message type is received that is not supported, or an optional format of a supported Message is not recognized.
contents.zh-CHS: 当接收到不受支持的可选消息类型，或无法识别受支持消息的可选格式时，将发送此错误消息。

contents.text: When this error message is received, the implementation SHOULD log the occurance, and notify an operator as appropriate. However, receipt has no effect on the operation of the protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 收到此错误消息后，实现应记录发生的情况，并酌情通知操作员。但是，接收对协议的运行没有影响。

contents.text: 8. Public Value Exchanges
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 公共价值交换

contents.text: Photuris is based in principle on public-key cryptography, specifically Diffie-Hellman key exchange. Exchange of public D-H Exchange-Values based on private-secret values results in a mutual shared-secret between the parties. This shared-secret can be used on its own, or to generate a series of session-keys for authentication and encryption of subsequent traffic.
contents.zh-CHS: Photuris原则上基于公钥加密，特别是Diffie-Hellman密钥交换。基于私有秘密值的公共D-H交换值的交换导致双方之间共享秘密。这个共享秘密可以单独使用，也可以生成一系列会话密钥，用于后续通信的身份验证和加密。

contents.text: This document assumes familiarity with the Diffie-Hellman public-key algorithm. A good description can be found in [Schneier95].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档假设您熟悉Diffie-Hellman公钥算法。在[Schneier95]中可以找到一个很好的描述。

contents.text: 8.1. Modular Exponentiation Groups
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1. 模幂群

contents.text: The original Diffie-Hellman technique [DH76] specified modular exponentiation. A public-value is generated using a generator (g), raised to a private-secret exponent (x), modulo a prime (p):
contents.zh-CHS: 最初的Diffie-Hellman技术[DH76]规定了模幂运算。使用生成器（g）生成公共值，将其提升为私有秘密指数（x），模素数（p）：

contents.text: (g**x) mod p.
contents.zh-CHS: （g**x）模块p。

contents.text: When these public-values are exchanged between parties, the parties can calculate a shared-secret value between themselves:
contents.zh-CHS: 当各方之间交换这些公共值时，各方可以计算其之间的共享秘密值：

contents.text: (g**xy) mod p.
contents.zh-CHS: （g**xy）模块p。

contents.text: The generator (g) and modulus (p) are established by the Scheme-Choice (see the "Basic Exchange-Schemes" for details). They are offered in the Cookie_Response, and one pair is chosen in the Value_Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 生成器（g）和模数（p）由方案选择确定（详见“基本交换方案”）。它们在Cookie\u响应中提供，在Value\u请求中选择一对。

contents.text: The private exponents (x) and (y) are kept secret by the parties. Only the public-value result of the modular exponentiation with (x) or (y) is sent as the Initiator and Responder Exchange-Value.
contents.zh-CHS: 私人代表（x）和（y）由双方保密。只有（x）或（y）的模幂运算的公共值结果作为发起方和响应方交换值发送。

contents.text: These public-values are represented in single Variable Precision Integers. The Size of these Exchange-Values will match the Size of the modulus (p).
contents.zh-CHS: 这些公共值以单变量精度整数表示。这些交换值的大小将与模数（p）的大小相匹配。

contents.text: 8.2. Moduli Selection
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2. 模量选择

contents.text: Each implementation proposes one or more moduli in its Offered-Schemes. Every implementation MUST support up to 1024-bit moduli.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个实现在其提供的方案中提出一个或多个模块。每个实现必须支持高达1024位的模。

contents.text: For any particular Photuris node, these moduli need not change for significant periods of time; likely days or weeks. A background process can periodically generate new moduli.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于任何特定的Photuris节点，这些模量在相当长的时间内不需要改变；可能是几天或几周。后台进程可以周期性地生成新的模块。

contents.text: For 512-bit moduli, current estimates would provide 64 (pessimistic) bit-equivalents of cryptographic strength.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于512位模，当前估计值将提供64位（悲观）等效加密强度。

contents.text: For 1024-bit moduli, current estimates would range from 80 (pessimistic) through 98 (optimistic) bit-equivalents of cryptographic strength.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于1024位模，当前估计值的范围为80位（悲观）到98位（乐观）等效密码强度。

contents.text: These estimates are used when choosing moduli that are appropriate for the desired Security Parameter attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 当选择适合所需安全参数属性的模时，使用这些估计值。

contents.text: 8.2.1. Bootstrap Moduli

Each implementation is likely to use a fixed modulus during its bootstrap, until it can generate another modulus in the background. As the bootstrap modulus will be widely distributed, and reused whenever the machine reinitializes, it SHOULD be a "safe" prime (p = 2q+1) to provide the greatest long-term protection.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个实现都可能在其引导过程中使用固定的模，直到它可以在后台生成另一个模。由于自举模量将广泛分布，并在机器重新初始化时重复使用，因此它应为“安全”素数（p=2q+1），以提供最大的长期保护。

contents.text: Implementors are encouraged to generate their own bootstrap moduli, and to change bootstrap moduli in successive implementation releases.
contents.zh-CHS: 鼓励实现者生成自己的引导模块，并在后续的实现版本中更改引导模块。

contents.text: 8.2.2. Learning Moduli
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2.2. 学习模块

contents.text: As Photuris exchanges are initiated, new moduli will be learned from the Responder Offered-Schemes. The Initiator MAY cache these moduli for its own use.
contents.zh-CHS: 当Photuris交换开始时，将从响应者提供的方案中学习新的模块。发起者可以缓存这些模块以供自己使用。

contents.text: Before offering any learned modulus, the implementation MUST perform at least one iteration of probable primality verification. In this fashion, many processors will perform verification in parallel as moduli are passed around.
contents.zh-CHS: 在提供任何学习的模之前，实现必须执行至少一次可能素性验证迭代。在这种方式下，当模传递时，许多处理器将并行执行验证。

contents.text: When primality verification failures are found, the failed moduli SHOULD be retained for some (implementation dependent) period of time, to avoid re-learning and re-testing after subsequent exchanges.
contents.zh-CHS: 当发现素性验证失败时，失败的模块应保留一段时间（取决于实现），以避免在后续交换后重新学习和重新测试。

contents.text: 8.3. Generator Selection
contents.zh-CHS: 8.3. 发电机选择

contents.text: The generator (g) should be chosen such that the private-secret exponents will generate all possible public-values, evenly distributed throughout the range of the modulus (p), without cycling through a smaller subset. Such a generator is called a "primitive root" (which is trivial to find when p is "safe").
contents.zh-CHS: 生成器（g）的选择应确保私密指数将生成所有可能的公共值，均匀分布在模数（p）的整个范围内，而不会循环通过较小的子集。这样的生成器称为“原始根”（当p是“安全的”时，很难找到它）。

contents.text: Only one generator (2) is required to be supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 只需支撑一台发电机（2）。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: One useful technique is to select the generator, and then limit the modulus selection sieve to primes with that generator:
contents.zh-CHS: 一种有用的技术是选择生成器，然后将模量选择筛限制为使用该生成器的素数：

contents.text: 2 when p (mod 24) = 11. 3 when p (mod 12) = 5. 5 when p (mod 10) = 3 or 7.
contents.zh-CHS: 当p（mod 24）=11时为2。当p（mod 12）=5时为3。当p（mod 10）=3或7时为5。

contents.text: The required generator (2) improves efficiency in multiplication performance. It is usable even when it is not a primitive root, as it still covers half of the space of possible residues.
contents.zh-CHS: 所需的生成器（2）提高了乘法性能的效率。即使它不是原始根，也可以使用，因为它仍然覆盖了可能的残基的一半空间。

contents.text: 8.4. Exponent Selection
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4. 指数选择

contents.text: Each implementation generates a separate random private-secret exponent for each different modulus. Then, a D-H Exchange-Value is calculated for the given modulus, generator, and exponent.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个实现为每个不同的模生成单独的随机私有秘密指数。然后，计算给定模数、生成器和指数的D-H交换值。

contents.text: This specification recommends that the exponent length be at least twice the desired cryptographic strength of the longest session-key needed by the strongest offered-attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范建议指数长度至少为所提供的最强属性所需的最长会话密钥的所需加密强度的两倍。

contents.text: Based on the estimates in "Moduli Selection" (above):
contents.zh-CHS: 根据“模量选择”（上文）中的估计：

contents.text: For 512-bit moduli, exponent lengths of 128 bits (or more) are recommended.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于512位模，建议指数长度为128位（或更多）。

contents.text: For 1024-bit moduli, exponent lengths of 160 to 256 bits (or more) are recommended.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于1024位模，建议指数长度为160到256位（或更多）。

contents.text: Although the same exponent and Exchange-Value may be used with several parties whenever the same modulus and generator are used, the exponent SHOULD be changed at random intervals. A background process can periodically destroy the old values, generate a new random private-secret exponent, and recalculate the Exchange-Value.
contents.zh-CHS: 尽管当使用相同的模数和生成器时，多方可使用相同的指数和交换值，但指数应以随机间隔进行更改。后台进程可以定期销毁旧值，生成新的随机私密指数，并重新计算交换值。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: The size of the exponent is entirely implementation dependent, is unknown to the other party, and can be easily changed.
contents.zh-CHS: 指数的大小完全依赖于实现，另一方不知道，并且很容易更改。

contents.text: Since these operations involve several time-consuming modular exponentiations, moving them to the "background" substantially improves the apparent execution speed of the Photuris protocol. It also reduces CPU loading sufficiently to allow a single public/private key-pair to be used in several closely spaced
contents.zh-CHS: 由于这些操作涉及多个耗时的模幂运算，因此将它们移动到“后台”可显著提高Photuris协议的表观执行速度。它还可以充分减少CPU负载，以允许在多个紧密间隔中使用单个公钥/私钥对

contents.text: Photuris executions, when creating Security Associations with several different nodes over a short period of time.
contents.zh-CHS: Photuris执行，在短时间内创建与多个不同节点的安全关联。

contents.text: Other pre-computation suggestions are described in [BGMW93, LL94, Rooij94].
contents.zh-CHS: 其他预计算建议如[BGMW93、LL94、Rooij94]所述。

contents.text: 8.5. Defective Exchange Values
contents.zh-CHS: 8.5. 有缺陷的交换价值

contents.text: Some exponents do not qualify as secret. The exponent 0 will generate the Exchange-Value 1, and the exponent 1 will generate the Exchange-Value g. Small exponents will be easily visible and SHOULD be avoided where:
contents.zh-CHS: 有些人不具备保密的资格。指数0将生成交换值1，指数1将生成交换值g。小指数将很容易看到，在以下情况下应避免使用：

contents.text: g**x < p.
contents.zh-CHS: g**x<p。

contents.text: Depending on the structure of the moduli, certain exponents can be used for sub-group confinement attacks. For "safe" primes (p = 2q+1), these exponents are p-1 and (p-1)/2, which will generate the Exchange-Values 1 and p-1 respectively.
contents.zh-CHS: 根据模的结构，某些指数可用于子群限制攻击。对于“安全”素数（p=2q+1），这些指数是p-1和（p-1）/2，它们将分别生成交换值1和p-1。

contents.text: When an implementation chooses a random exponent, the resulting Exchange-Value is examined. If the Exchange-Value is represented in less than half the number of significant bits in the modulus, then a new random exponent MUST be chosen.
contents.zh-CHS: 当一个实现选择一个随机指数时，将检查得到的交换值。如果交换值表示为模中有效位数的一半以下，则必须选择新的随机指数。

contents.text: For 512-bit moduli, Exchange-Values of 2**256 or greater are required.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于512位模，要求交换值为2**256或更大。

contents.text: For 1024-bit moduli, Exchange-Values of 2**512 or greater are required.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于1024位模，要求交换值为2**512或更大。

contents.text: In addition, if the resulting Exchange-Value is p-1, then a new random exponent MUST be chosen.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，如果生成的交换值为p-1，则必须选择新的随机指数。

contents.text: Upon receipt of an Exchange-Value that fails to meet the requirements, the Value Exchange message is silently discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 在收到不符合要求的交换值时，值交换消息将自动丢弃。

contents.text: Implementation Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：

contents.text: Avoidance of small exponents can be assured by setting at least one bit in the most significant half of the exponent.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过在指数的最高有效一半设置至少一位，可以确保避免小指数。

contents.text: 9. Basic Exchange-Schemes
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 基本交换计划

contents.text: Initial values are assigned as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 初始值分配如下：

contents.text: (0) Reserved.
contents.zh-CHS: (0) 保留的。

contents.text: (1) Reserved.
contents.zh-CHS: (1) 保留的。

contents.text: (2) Implementation Required. Any modulus (p) with a recommended generator (g) of 2. When the Exchange-Scheme Size is non-zero, the modulus is contained in the Exchange-Scheme Value field in the list of Offered-Schemes.
contents.zh-CHS: (2) 需要执行。任何模数（p），推荐的发电机（g）为2。当交换方案大小为非零时，模数包含在所提供方案列表中的交换方案值字段中。

contents.text: An Exchange-Scheme Size of zero is invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: 交换方案大小为零无效。

contents.text: Key-Generation-Function "MD5 Hash" Privacy-Method "Simple Masking" Validity-Method "MD5-IPMAC Check"
contents.zh-CHS: 密钥生成函数“MD5哈希”隐私方法“简单屏蔽”有效性方法“MD5-IPMAC检查”

contents.text: This combination of features requires a modulus with at least 64-bits of cryptographic strength.
contents.zh-CHS: 这种特性的组合需要具有至少64位加密强度的模。

contents.text: (3) Exchange-Schemes 3 to 255 are intended for future well-known published schemes.
contents.zh-CHS: (3) Exchange方案3至255适用于未来著名的已发布方案。

contents.text: (256) Exchange-Schemes 256 to 32767 are intended for vendor-specific unpublished schemes. Implementors wishing a number MUST request the number from the authors.
contents.zh-CHS: （256）Exchange方案256至32767适用于特定于供应商的未发布方案。希望获得数字的实现者必须向作者请求该数字。

contents.text: (32768) Exchange-Schemes 32768 to 65535 are available for cooperating parties to indicate private schemes, regardless of vendor implementation. These numbers are not reserved, and are subject to duplication. Other criteria, such as the IP Source and Destination of the Cookie_Request, are used to differentiate the particular Exchange-Schemes available.
contents.zh-CHS: （32768）交换方案32768至65535可供合作方用于指示私有方案，而不考虑供应商的实施。这些号码没有保留，可能会重复。其他标准（如Cookie_请求的IP源和目标）用于区分可用的特定交换方案。

contents.text: 10. Basic Key-Generation-Function 10.1. MD5 Hash
contents.zh-CHS: 10. 基本密钥生成功能10.1。MD5散列

contents.text: MD5 [RFC-1321] is used as a pseudo-random-function for generating the key(s). The key(s) begin with the most significant bits of the hash. MD5 is iterated as needed to generate the requisite length of key material.
contents.zh-CHS: MD5[RFC-1321]用作生成密钥的伪随机函数。密钥以散列的最高有效位开始。根据需要对MD5进行迭代，以生成所需长度的关键材料。

contents.text: When an individual key does not use all 128-bits of the last hash, any remaining unused (least significant) bits of the last hash are discarded. When combined with other uses of key generation for the same purpose, the next key will begin with a new hash iteration.
contents.zh-CHS: 当单个密钥未使用最后一个哈希的所有128位时，将丢弃最后一个哈希的任何剩余未使用（最低有效）位。当与密钥生成的其他用途结合使用时，下一个密钥将以新的哈希迭代开始。

contents.text: 11. Basic Privacy-Method 11.1. Simple Masking
contents.zh-CHS: 11. 基本隐私方法11.1。简单掩蔽

contents.text: As described in "Privacy-Key Computation", sufficient privacy-key material is generated to match the message length, beginning with the next field after the SPI, and including the Padding. The message is masked by XOR with the privacy-key.
contents.zh-CHS: 如“隐私密钥计算”中所述，生成足够的隐私密钥材料以匹配消息长度，从SPI后的下一个字段开始，并包括填充。消息被带有隐私密钥的XOR屏蔽。

contents.text: 12. Basic Validity-Method 12.1. MD5-IPMAC Check
contents.zh-CHS: 12. 基本有效性方法12.1。MD5-IPMAC检查

contents.text: As described in "Validity Verification", the Verification field value is the MD5 [RFC-1321] hash over the concatenation of
contents.zh-CHS: 如“有效性验证”中所述，验证字段的值是

contents.text: MD5( key, keyfill, data, datafill, key, md5fill )
contents.zh-CHS: MD5（键，键填充，数据，数据填充，键，md5fill）

contents.text: where the key is the computed verification-key.
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，密钥是计算的验证密钥。

contents.text: The keyfill and datafill use the same pad-with-length technique defined for md5fill. This padding and length is implicit, and does not appear in the datagram.
contents.zh-CHS: keyfill和datafill使用相同的键盘，长度技术为md5fill定义。此填充和长度是隐式的，不会出现在数据报中。

contents.text: The resulting Verification field is a 128-bit Variable Precision Integer (18 bytes including Size). When used in calculations, the Verification data includes both the Size and Value fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 结果验证字段是128位可变精度整数（包括大小在内的18个字节）。在计算中使用时，验证数据包括大小和值字段。

contents.text: 13. Basic Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 13. 基本属性

contents.text: Implementors wishing a number MUST request the number from the authors. Initial values are assigned as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 希望获得数字的实现者必须向作者请求该数字。初始值分配如下：

contents.text:
Use    Type
 -       0* padding
 -       1* AH-Attributes
 -       2+ ESP-Attributes
AEI      5* MD5-IPMAC
AEIX   255+ Organizational
A AH Attribute-Choice E ESP Attribute-Choice I Identity-Choice X dependent on list location + feature must be recognized even when not supported * feature must be supported (mandatory)
contents.zh-CHS: AH属性选择E ESP属性选择I标识选择X依赖于列表位置+功能，即使在不受支持时也必须识别*功能必须受支持（必需）

contents.text: Other attributes are specified in companion documents.
contents.zh-CHS: 其他属性在附带文档中指定。

contents.text: 13.1. Padding
Attribute 0
contents.zh-CHS: 属性0

contents.text: Each attribute may have value fields that are multiple bytes. To facilitate processing efficiency, these fields are aligned on integral modulo 8 byte (64-bit) boundaries.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个属性可能有多个字节的值字段。为了提高处理效率，这些字段在整数模8字节（64位）边界上对齐。

contents.text: Padding is accomplished by insertion of 1 to 7 Attribute 0 padding bytes before the attribute that needs alignment.
contents.zh-CHS: 填充是通过在需要对齐的属性之前插入1到7个属性0填充字节来完成的。

contents.text: No padding is used after the final attribute in a list.
contents.zh-CHS: 列表中最后一个属性后不使用填充。

contents.text: 13.2. AH-Attributes
Attribute 1
contents.zh-CHS: 属性1

contents.text: Length 0
contents.zh-CHS: 长度0

contents.text: When a list of Attributes is specified, this Attribute begins the section of the list which applies to the Authentication Header (AH).
contents.zh-CHS: 当指定属性列表时，该属性从列表中应用于身份验证头（AH）的部分开始。

contents.text: 13.3. ESP-Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 13.3. ESP属性

contents.text: Attribute 2
contents.zh-CHS: 属性2

contents.text: Length 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度1

contents.text: PayloadType 1 byte. Indicates the contents of the ESP Transform Data field, using the IP Next Header (Protocol) value. Up-to-date values of the IP Next Header (Protocol) are specified in the most recent "Assigned Numbers" [RFC-1700].
contents.zh-CHS: PayloadType 1字节。使用IP下一个标头（协议）值指示ESP转换数据字段的内容。IP下一个报头（协议）的最新值在最近的“分配编号”[RFC-1700]中指定。

contents.text: For example, when encrypting an entire IP datagram, this field will contain the value 4, indicating IP-in-IP encapsulation.
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，加密整个IP数据报时，此字段将包含值4，表示IP封装中的IP。

contents.text: When a list of Attributes is specified, this Attribute begins the section of the list which applies to the Encapsulating Security Payload (ESP).
contents.zh-CHS: 当指定属性列表时，此属性从列表中应用于封装安全有效负载（ESP）的部分开始。

contents.text: When listed as an Offered-Attribute, the PayloadType is set to 255.
contents.zh-CHS: 当作为提供的属性列出时，PayloadType设置为255。

contents.text: When selected as an Attribute-Choice, the PayloadType is set to the actual value to be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 选择PayloadType作为属性选项时，PayloadType将设置为要使用的实际值。

contents.text: 13.4. MD5-IPMAC
contents.zh-CHS: 13.4. MD5-IPMAC

contents.text: Attribute 5
contents.zh-CHS: 属性5

contents.text: Length 0
contents.zh-CHS: 长度0

contents.text: 13.4.1. Symmetric Identification

When selected as an Identity-Choice, the immediately following Identification field contains an unstructured Variable Precision Integer. Valid Identifications and symmetric secret-keys are preconfigured by the parties.
contents.zh-CHS: 选择作为标识选项时，紧跟其后的标识字段包含一个非结构化变量精度整数。有效标识和对称密钥由双方预先配置。

contents.text: There is no required format or content for the Identification value. The value may be a number or string of any kind. See "Use of Identification and Secrets" for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 标识值没有必需的格式或内容。该值可以是任何类型的数字或字符串。有关详细信息，请参阅“标识和机密的使用”。

contents.text: The symmetric secret-key (as specified) is selected based on the contents of the Identification field. All implementations MUST support at least 62 bytes. The selected symmetric secret-key SHOULD provide at least 64-bits of cryptographic strength.
contents.zh-CHS: 根据标识字段的内容选择对称密钥（如指定）。所有实现必须至少支持62个字节。所选对称密钥应提供至少64位的加密强度。

contents.text: As described in "Identity Verification", the Verification field value is the MD5 [RFC-1321] hash over the concatenation of:
contents.zh-CHS: 如“身份验证”中所述，验证字段值是以下各项串联的MD5[RFC-1321]散列：

contents.text: MD5( key, keyfill, data, datafill, key, md5fill )
contents.zh-CHS: MD5（键，键填充，数据，数据填充，键，md5fill）

contents.text: where the key is the computed verification-key.
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，密钥是计算的验证密钥。

contents.text: The keyfill and datafill use the same pad-with-length technique defined for md5fill. This padding and length is implicit, and does not appear in the datagram.
contents.zh-CHS: keyfill和datafill使用相同的键盘，长度技术为md5fill定义。此填充和长度是隐式的，不会出现在数据报中。

contents.text: The resulting Verification field is a 128-bit Variable Precision Integer (18 bytes including Size). When used in calculations, the Verification data includes both the Size and Value fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 结果验证字段是128位可变精度整数（包括大小在内的18个字节）。在计算中使用时，验证数据包括大小和值字段。

contents.text: For both "Identity Verification" and "Validity Verification", the verification-key is the MD5 [RFC-1321] hash of the following concatenated values:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于“身份验证”和“有效性验证”，验证密钥是以下串联值的MD5[RFC-1321]散列：

contents.text: + the symmetric secret-key, + the computed shared-secret.
contents.zh-CHS: + 对称密钥+计算的共享密钥。

contents.text: For "Session-Key Computation", the symmetric secret-key is used directly as the generation-key.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于“会话密钥计算”，对称密钥直接用作生成密钥。

contents.text: Regardless of the internal representation of the symmetric secret-key, when used in calculations it is in the same form as the Value part of a Variable Precision Integer:
contents.zh-CHS: 无论对称密钥的内部表示形式如何，在计算中使用对称密钥时，其形式与可变精度整数的值部分相同：

contents.text: - most significant byte first. - bits used are right justified within byte boundaries. - any unused bits are in the most significant byte. - unused bits are zero filled.
contents.zh-CHS: - 最高有效字节在前。-使用的位在字节边界内右对齐。-任何未使用的位都在最高有效字节中。-未使用的位是零填充的。

contents.text: The symmetric secret-key does not include a Size field.
contents.zh-CHS: 对称密钥不包括大小字段。

contents.text: 13.4.2. Authentication
May be selected as an AH or ESP Attribute-Choice, pursuant to [RFC-1828] et sequitur. The selected Exchange-Scheme SHOULD provide at least 64-bits of cryptographic strength.
contents.zh-CHS: 可根据[RFC-1828]等选择作为AH或ESP属性选择。所选交换方案应提供至少64位的加密强度。

contents.text: As described in "Session-Key Computation", the most significant 384- bits (48 bytes) of the Key-Generation-Function iterations are used for the key.
contents.zh-CHS: 如“会话密钥计算”中所述，密钥生成函数迭代的最高有效384位（48字节）用于密钥。

contents.text: Profile:
contents.zh-CHS: 轮廓：

contents.text: When negotiated with Photuris, the transform differs slightly from [RFC-1828].
contents.zh-CHS: 与Photuris协商时，转换与[RFC-1828]略有不同。

contents.text: The form of the authenticated message is:
contents.zh-CHS: 已验证消息的形式为：

contents.text: MD5( key, keyfill, datagram, datafill, key, md5fill )
contents.zh-CHS: MD5（键，键填充，数据报，数据填充，键，md5fill）

contents.text: where the key is the SPI session-key.
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，密钥是SPI会话密钥。

contents.text: The additional datafill protects against the (impractical) attack described in [PO96]. The keyfill and datafill use the same pad-with-length technique defined for md5fill. This padding and length is implicit, and does not appear in the datagram.
contents.zh-CHS: 额外的数据填充可防止[PO96]中所述的（不切实际的）攻击。keyfill和datafill使用相同的键盘，长度技术为md5fill定义。此填充和长度是隐式的，不会出现在数据报中。

contents.text: 13.5. Organizational
Attribute 255
contents.zh-CHS: 属性255

contents.text: Length >= 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度>=4

contents.text: When the Length is four, no Value(s) field is present.
contents.zh-CHS: 当长度为4时，不存在值字段。

contents.text: OUI 3 bytes. The vendor's Organizationally Unique Identifier, assigned by IEEE 802 or IANA (see [RFC-1700] for contact details). The bits within the byte are in canonical order, and the most significant byte is transmitted first.
contents.zh-CHS: 是3个字节。供应商的组织唯一标识符，由IEEE 802或IANA分配（联系方式详见[RFC-1700]）。字节内的位按规范顺序排列，最高有效字节首先传输。

contents.text: Kind 1 byte. Indicates a sub-type for the OUI. There is no standardization for this field. Each OUI implements its own values.
contents.zh-CHS: 第1类字节。表示OUI的子类型。这个领域没有标准化。每个OUI实现自己的值。

contents.text: Value(s) 0 or more bytes. The details are implementation specific.
contents.zh-CHS: 值为0个或更多字节。细节是具体实施的。

contents.text: Some implementors might not need nor want to publish their proprietary algorithms and attributes. This OUI mechanism is available to specify these without encumbering the authors with proprietary number requests.
contents.zh-CHS: 一些实现者可能不需要也不想发布他们的专有算法和属性。此OUI机制可用于指定这些，而不会因专有号码请求而妨碍作者。

contents.text: A. Automaton
contents.zh-CHS: A.自动机

contents.text: An example automaton is provided to illustrate the operation of the protocol. It is incomplete and non-deterministic; many of the Good/Bad semantic decisions are policy-based or too difficult to represent in tabular form. Where conflicts appear between this example and the text, the text takes precedence.
contents.zh-CHS: 提供了一个示例自动机来说明协议的操作。它是不完全的、不确定的；许多好的/坏的语义决策都是基于策略的，或者很难以表格形式表示。如果此示例与文本之间出现冲突，则以文本为准。

contents.text: The finite-state automaton is defined by events, actions and state transitions. Events include reception of external commands such as expiration of a timer, and reception of datagrams from a peer. Actions include the starting of timers and transmission of datagrams to the peer.
contents.zh-CHS: 有限状态自动机由事件、动作和状态转换定义。事件包括接收外部命令，例如计时器过期，以及接收来自对等方的数据报。行动包括启动定时器和向对等方传输数据报。

contents.text: Events
contents.zh-CHS: 事件

contents.text: DU13 = Communication Administratively Prohibited SF0 = Bad SPI SF4 = Need Authentication SF5 = Need Authorization WC = Want Confidentiality
contents.zh-CHS: DU13=通信管理禁止SF0=错误SPI SF4=需要身份验证SF5=需要授权WC=需要保密

contents.text:
RCQ+ = Receive Cookie_Request (Good)
RCQ- = Receive Cookie_Request (Bad)
RCR+ = Receive Cookie_Response (Good)
RCR- = Receive Cookie_Response (Bad)

RVQ+ = Receive Value_Request (Good)
RVQ- = Receive Value_Request (Bad)
RVR+ = Receive Value_Response (Good)
RVR- = Receive Value_Response (Bad)

RIQ+ = Receive Identity_Request (Good)
RIQ- = Receive Identity_Request (Bad)
RIR+ = Receive Identity_Response (Good)
RIR- = Receive Identity_Response (Bad)

RUN+ = Receive SPI_Needed (Good)
RUN- = Receive SPI_Needed (Bad)
RUM+ = Receive SPI_Update (Good)
RUM- = Receive SPI_Update (Bad)
RBC = Receive Bad Cookie RRL = Receive Resource Limit RVF = Receive Verification Failure RMR = Receive Message Reject

contents.zh-CHS: 行动

contents.zh-CHS: svq=发送值\请求svr=发送值\响应

contents.zh-CHS: siq=发送标识\请求sir=发送标识\响应

se* = Send error message (see text) sbc = Send Bad Cookie srl = Send Resource Limit svf = Send Verification Failure
contents.zh-CHS: se*=发送错误消息（见正文）sbc=发送坏Cookie srl=发送资源限制svf=发送验证失败

A.2. States
contents.zh-CHS: A.2. 州

contents.text: Following is a more detailed description of each automaton state.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面是对每个自动机状态的更详细描述。

contents.text: The "Bad" version of a state is to indicate that the Bad_Cookie or Resource_Limit message has been received.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态的“坏”版本表示已收到坏的\u Cookie或资源\u限制消息。

contents.text: A.2.1. Initial
contents.zh-CHS: A.2.1. 最初的

contents.text: The Initial state is fictional, in that there is no state between the parties.
contents.zh-CHS: 最初的状态是虚构的，因为双方之间没有状态。

contents.text: A.2.2. Cookie
In the Cookie state, the Initiator has sent a Cookie_Request, and is waiting for a Cookie_Response. Both the Restart and Exchange timers are running.
contents.zh-CHS: 在Cookie状态下，启动器已发送Cookie\u请求，并正在等待Cookie\u响应。重新启动计时器和Exchange计时器都在运行。

contents.text: Note that the Responder has no Cookie state.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，响应程序没有Cookie状态。

contents.text: A.2.3. Value
In the Value state, the Initiator has sent its Exchange-Value, and is waiting for an Identity_Message. Both the Restart and Exchange timers are running.
contents.zh-CHS: 在值状态下，启动器已发送其交换值，并正在等待Identity_消息。重新启动计时器和Exchange计时器都在运行。

contents.text: A.2.4. Identity
In the Identity state, the Initiator has sent an Identity_Request, and is waiting for an Identity_Response in reply. Both the Restart and Exchange timers are running.
contents.zh-CHS: 在标识状态下，发起方已发送标识请求，并正在等待标识响应。重新启动计时器和Exchange计时器都在运行。

contents.text: A.2.5. Ready
contents.zh-CHS: A.2.5. 准备好的

contents.text: In the Ready state, the Responder has sent its Exchange-Value, and is waiting for an Identity_Message. The Exchange timer is running.
contents.zh-CHS: 在就绪状态下，响应程序已发送其交换值，并正在等待Identity_消息。交换计时器正在运行。

contents.text: A.2.6. Update
contents.zh-CHS: A.2.6. 使现代化

contents.text: In the Update state, each party has concluded the Photuris exchange, and is unilaterally updating expiring SPIs until the Exchange LifeTime expires. Both the Update and Exchange timers are running.
contents.zh-CHS: 在更新状态下，各方已完成Photuris交换，并单方面更新到期的SPI，直到交换生存期到期。更新和交换计时器都在运行。

contents.text: B. Use of Identification and Secrets
contents.zh-CHS: B.身份和秘密的使用

contents.text: Implementation of the base protocol requires support for operator configuration of participant identities and associated symmetric secret-keys.
contents.zh-CHS: 基本协议的实现需要支持参与者身份和相关对称密钥的操作员配置。

contents.text: The form of the Identification and Secret fields is not constrained to be a readable string. In addition to a simpler quoted string configuration, an implementation MUST allow configuration of an arbitrary stream of bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 标识和秘密字段的形式不限于可读字符串。除了更简单的带引号的字符串配置外，实现还必须允许配置任意字节流。

contents.text: B.1. Identification
contents.zh-CHS: B.1. 识别

contents.text: Typically, the Identification is a user name, a site name, a Fully Qualified Domain Name, or an email address which contains a user name and a domain name. Examples include:
contents.zh-CHS: 通常，标识是用户名、站点名、完全限定的域名或包含用户名和域名的电子邮件地址。例子包括：

contents.text: user node.site. user@node.site. rcmd@node.site. "Mundane Name" <user@node.site>
contents.zh-CHS: 用户节点.site。user@node.site. rcmd@node.site. “平凡的名字”<user@node.site>

contents.text: There is no requirement that the domain name match any of the particular IP addresses in use by the parties.
contents.zh-CHS: 不要求域名与双方使用的任何特定IP地址匹配。

contents.text: B.2. Group Identity With Group Secret
contents.zh-CHS: B.2. 具有群秘密的群标识

contents.text: A simple configuration approach could use a single Identity and Secret, distributed to all the participants in the trusted group. This might be appropriate between routers under a single administration comprising a Virtual Private Network over the Internet.
contents.zh-CHS: 一种简单的配置方法可以使用单个标识和密码，分发给受信任组中的所有参与者。这可能适用于由Internet上的虚拟专用网络组成的单一管理下的路由器之间。

contents.text: Nota Bene: The passwords used in these examples do not meet the "MD5-IPMAC Symmetric Identification" recommendation for at least 64-bits of cryptographic strength.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：这些示例中使用的密码不符合至少64位密码强度的“MD5-IPMAC对称标识”建议。

contents.text: The administrator configures each router with the same username and password:
contents.zh-CHS: 管理员使用相同的用户名和密码配置每个路由器：

contents.text: identity local "Tiny VPN 1995 November" "abracadabra" identity remote "Tiny VPN 1995 November" "abracadabra"
contents.zh-CHS: 标识本地“Tiny VPN 1995 11月”“abracadabra”标识远程“Tiny VPN 1995 11月”“abracadabra”

contents.text: When the Initiator sends its Identity_Request, the SPI Owner
contents.zh-CHS: 当启动器发送其标识请求时，SPI所有者

contents.text: Identification field is "Tiny VPN 1995 November" and the SPI Owner secret-key is "abracadabra".
contents.zh-CHS: 标识字段为“Tiny VPN 1995 11月”，SPI所有者密钥为“abracadabra”。

contents.text: When the Responder sends its Identity_Response, the SPI Owner Identification field is "Tiny VPN 1995 November" and the SPI Owner secret-key is "abracadabra". The SPI User Identification is "Tiny VPN 1995 November" (taken from the request), and the SPI User secret-key is "abracadabra".
contents.zh-CHS: 当响应者发送其Identity_响应时，SPI所有者标识字段为“Tiny VPN 1995 11月”，SPI所有者密钥为“abracadabra”。SPI用户标识为“Tiny VPN 1995-11”（取自请求），SPI用户密钥为“abracadabra”。

contents.text: Note that even in the face of implementations with very poor random number generation yielding the same random numbers for both parties at every step, and with this completely identical configuration, the addition of the SPI User Verification field in the response calculation is highly likely to produce a different Verification value (see "Identity Verification"). In turn, the different Verification values affect the calculation of SPI session-keys that are highly likely to be different in each direction (see "Session-Key Computation").
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，即使面对随机数生成非常差的实现，在每一步都会为双方产生相同的随机数，并且在这种完全相同的配置下，在响应计算中添加SPI用户验证字段也极有可能产生不同的验证值（参见“身份验证”）。反过来，不同的验证值会影响SPI会话密钥的计算，这些密钥在每个方向上很可能不同（请参阅“会话密钥计算”）。

contents.text: B.3. Multiple Identities With Group Secrets
contents.zh-CHS: B.3. 具有组机密的多重身份

contents.text: A more robust configuration approach could use a separate Identity and Secret for each party, distributed to the participants in the trusted group. This might be appropriate for authenticated firewall traversal.
contents.zh-CHS: 更健壮的配置方法可以为每一方使用单独的身份和秘密，并分发给受信任组中的参与者。这可能适用于经过身份验证的防火墙遍历。

contents.text: An administrator has one or more networks, and a number of mobile users. It is desirable to restrict access to authorized external users. The example boundary router is 10.0.0.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 管理员拥有一个或多个网络和多个移动用户。希望限制授权外部用户的访问。示例边界路由器是10.0.0.1。

contents.text: The administrator gives each user a different username and password, together with a group username and password for the router.
contents.zh-CHS: 管理员为每个用户提供不同的用户名和密码，以及路由器的组用户名和密码。

contents.text: The administrator configures (in part):
contents.zh-CHS: 管理员配置（部分）：

contents.text: identity local "199511@router.site" "FalDaRah" identity remote "Happy_Wanderer@router.site" "FalDaRee"
contents.zh-CHS: “本地身份”199511@router.site“法尔达拉”身份遥控“快乐”_Wanderer@router.site“法尔达里”

contents.text: Each mobile user adds commands to tunnel and authenticate.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个移动用户向隧道添加命令并进行身份验证。

contents.text: route addprivate 10.0.0.0/8 tunnel 10.0.0.1 secure 10.0.0.1 authenticate-only identity local "Happy_Wanderer@router.site" "FalDaRee" identity remote "199511@router.site" "FalDaRah" identity remote "199512@router.site" "FalDaHaHaHaHaHaHa"
contents.zh-CHS: route addprivate 10.0.0.0/8 tunnel 10.0.0.1安全10.0.0.1仅验证身份本地“快乐”_Wanderer@router.site“FalDaRee”身份遥控器199511@router.site“FalDaRah”身份遥控器199512@router.site“法尔达哈哈”

contents.text: When the mobile Initiator sends its Identity_Request, the SPI Owner
contents.zh-CHS: 当移动启动器发送其标识请求时，SPI所有者

contents.text: Identification field is "Happy_Wanderer@router.site" and the SPI Owner secret-key is "FalDaRee".
contents.zh-CHS: 识别字段是“快乐的”_Wanderer@router.siteSPI所有者的秘密密钥是“Faldarie”。

contents.text: When the firewall Responder sends its Identity_Response, the SPI Owner Identification field is "199511@router.site" and the SPI Owner secret-key is "FalDaRah". The SPI User Identification field is "Happy_Wanderer@router.site" (taken from the request), and the SPI User secret-key is "FalDaRee".
contents.zh-CHS: 当防火墙响应程序发送其标识\u响应时，SPI所有者标识字段为“199511@router.siteSPI所有者的秘密密钥是“FalDaRah”。SPI用户标识字段为“高兴”_Wanderer@router.site“（取自请求），SPI用户密钥为“Faldarie”。

contents.text: In this example, the mobile user is already prepared for a monthly password changeover, where the router might identify itself as "199512@router.site".
contents.zh-CHS: 在本例中，移动用户已经准备好每月更换密码，路由器可能会将自己标识为“199512@router.site".

contents.text: B.4. Multiple Identities With Multiple Secrets
contents.zh-CHS: B.4. 多重身份与多重秘密

contents.text: Greater security might be achieved through configuration of a pair of secrets between each party. As before, one secret is used for initial contact to any member of the group, but another secret is used between specific parties. Compromise of one secret or pair of secrets does not affect any other member of the group. This might be appropriate between the routers forming a boundary between cooperating Virtual Private Networks that establish local policy for each VPN member access.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过在各方之间配置一对秘密，可以实现更高的安全性。和以前一样，一个秘密用于与组中任何成员的初始接触，但另一个秘密用于特定各方之间。泄露一个或两个秘密不会影响组中的任何其他成员。这可能适用于形成协作虚拟专用网络之间边界的路由器之间，协作虚拟专用网络为每个VPN成员访问建立本地策略。

contents.text: One administrator configures:
contents.zh-CHS: 一名管理员配置：

contents.text: identity local "Apple" "all for one" identity local "Apple-Baker" "Apple to Baker" "Baker" identity remote "Baker" "one for all" identity remote "Baker-Apple" "Baker to Apple"
contents.zh-CHS: 标识本地“苹果”标识本地“苹果面包师”苹果对面包师“面包师”标识远程“面包师”标识远程“面包师”标识远程“面包师苹果”面包师对苹果

contents.text: Another configures:
contents.zh-CHS: 另一个配置：

contents.text: identity local "Baker" "one for all" identity local "Baker-Apple" "Baker to Apple" "Apple" identity remote "Apple" "all for one" identity remote "Apple-Baker" "Apple to Baker"
contents.zh-CHS: 标识本地“面包师”标识本地“面包师苹果”标识本地“面包师苹果”标识远程“苹果”标识远程“苹果”标识远程“苹果”标识远程“苹果面包师”标识远程“苹果面包师”

contents.text: When the Initiator sends its Identity_Request, the SPI Owner Identification field is "Apple" and the SPI Owner secret-key is "all for one".
contents.zh-CHS: 当启动器发送其标识请求时，SPI所有者标识字段为“Apple”，SPI所有者密钥为“all for one”。

contents.text: When the Responder sends its Identity_Response, finding that the special pairing exists for "Apple" (in this example, indicated by a third field), the SPI Owner Identification field is "Baker-Apple" and the SPI Owner secret-key is "Baker to Apple". The SPI User Identification is "Apple" (taken from the request), and the SPI User
contents.zh-CHS: 当响应者发送其Identity_响应时，发现“Apple”存在特殊配对（在本例中，由第三个字段指示），SPI所有者标识字段为“Baker Apple”，SPI所有者密钥为“Baker to Apple”。SPI用户标识为“Apple”（取自请求），SPI用户

contents.text: secret-key is "all for one".
contents.zh-CHS: 秘钥是“一切为了一”。

contents.text: Operational Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 业务考虑

contents.text: The specification provides only a few configurable parameters, with defaults that should satisfy most situations.
contents.zh-CHS: 该规范仅提供少数可配置参数，默认值应满足大多数情况。

contents.text: Retransmissions Default: 3.
contents.zh-CHS: 重新传输默认值：3。

contents.text: Initial Retransmission TimeOut (IRTO) Default: 5 seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: 初始重传超时（IRTO）默认值：5秒。

contents.text: Exchange TimeOut (ETO) Default: 30 seconds. Minimum: Retransmissions * IRTO.
contents.zh-CHS: 交换超时（ETO）默认值：30秒。最小值：重传*IRTO。

contents.text: Exchange LifeTime (ELT) Default: 30 minutes. Minimum: 2 * ETO.
contents.zh-CHS: Exchange生存期（ELT）默认值：30分钟。最低：2*ETO。

contents.text: SPI LifeTime (SPILT) Default: 5 minutes. Minimum: 3 * ETO.
contents.zh-CHS: SPI生存期（SPILT）默认值：5分钟。最低：3*ETO。

contents.text: Each party configures a list of known identities and symmetric secret-keys.
contents.zh-CHS: 各方配置已知身份和对称密钥的列表。

contents.text: In addition, each party configures local policy that determines what access (if any) is granted to the holder of a particular identity. For example, the party might allow anonymous FTP, but prohibit Telnet. Such considerations are outside the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，各方配置本地策略，以确定授予特定身份持有者的访问权限（如果有）。例如，该方可能允许匿名FTP，但禁止Telnet。此类考虑不在本文件的范围内。

contents.text: Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 安全考虑

contents.text: Photuris was based on currently available tools, by experienced network protocol designers with an interest in cryptography, rather than by cryptographers with an interest in network protocols. This specification is intended to be readily implementable without requiring an extensive background in cryptology.
contents.zh-CHS: Photuris基于当前可用的工具，由对密码学感兴趣的经验丰富的网络协议设计师，而不是对网络协议感兴趣的密码学家设计。本规范旨在易于实现，无需广泛的密码学背景。

contents.text: Therefore, only minimal background cryptologic discussion and rationale is included in this document. Although some review has been provided by the general cryptologic community, it is anticipated that design decisions and tradeoffs will be thoroughly analysed in subsequent dissertations and debated for many years to come.
contents.zh-CHS: 因此，本文件仅包含最低限度的密码学背景讨论和基本原理。虽然一般密码学界已经提供了一些评论，但预计设计决策和权衡将在随后的论文中进行彻底分析，并在未来的许多年中进行辩论。

contents.text: Cryptologic details are reserved for separate documents that may be more readily and timely updated with new analysis.
contents.zh-CHS: 密码学详细信息保留给单独的文档，这些文档可能更容易通过新的分析及时更新。

contents.text: History
contents.zh-CHS: 历史

contents.text: The initial specification of Photuris, now called version 1 (December 1994 to March 1995), was based on a short list of design requirements, and simple experimental code by Phil Karn. Only one modular exponentiation form was used, with a single byte index of pre-specified group parameters. The transform attributes were selected during the public value exchange. Party privacy was protected in the identification signature exchange with standard ESP transforms.
contents.zh-CHS: Photuris的初始规范，现在称为版本1（1994年12月至1995年3月），基于Phil Karn的设计要求短列表和简单的实验代码。只使用了一种模幂形式，带有预先指定的组参数的单字节索引。转换属性是在公共值交换期间选择的。通过标准ESP转换，在身份签名交换中保护了当事人隐私。

contents.text: Upon submission for review by the IP Security Working Group, a large number of features were demanded. A mere 254 future group choices were not deemed enough; it was expanded to two bytes (and renamed schemes), and was expanded again to carry variable parameters. The transform attributes were made variable length to accomodate optional parameters. Every other possible parameter was made negotiable. Some participants were unable to switch modes on the UDP sockets to use standard ESP transforms for only some messages, and party privacy was integrated into the protocol. The message headers were reorganized, and selection of transform attributes was delayed until the identification exchange. An additional update message phase was added.
contents.zh-CHS: 在提交IP安全工作组审查时，要求提供大量功能。只有254个未来的群体选择被认为是不够的；它被扩展到两个字节（并重命名为schemes），然后再次扩展以携带可变参数。变换属性的长度可变，以容纳可选参数。所有其他可能的参数都可以协商。一些参与者无法在UDP套接字上切换模式以仅对某些消息使用标准ESP转换，协议中集成了参与方隐私。消息头被重新组织，转换属性的选择被延迟到标识交换。添加了一个额外的更新消息阶段。

contents.text: Version 2 (July 1995 to December 1995) specification stability was achieved in November 1995 by moving most parameters into separate documents for later discussion, and leaving only a few mandatory features in the base specification. Within a month, multiple interoperable implementations were produced.
contents.zh-CHS: 第2版（1995年7月至1995年12月）规范的稳定性于1995年11月通过将大多数参数移动到单独的文件中以供以后讨论而实现，并且在基本规范中只留下一些强制性特征。在一个月内，产生了多个可互操作的实现。

contents.text: Unfortunately, in a fit of demagoguery, the IP Security Working Group decided in a straw poll to remove party privacy protection, and the Working Group chair terminated the meeting without allowing further discussion. Because the identification exchange messages required privacy to function correctly, the messages were reorganized again. Party privacy and other optional schemes were split into a separate document.
contents.zh-CHS: 不幸的是，在一阵煽动中，知识产权安全工作组在一次草率投票中决定取消当事人隐私保护，工作组主席在不允许进一步讨论的情况下终止了会议。由于身份交换消息需要隐私才能正常工作，因此再次对消息进行了重新组织。当事人隐私和其他可选方案被拆分为单独的文件。

contents.text: The implementors established a separate discussion group. Version 3 (April 1996 to June 1997) enjoyed a long period of specification stability and multiple implementations on half a dozen platforms.
contents.zh-CHS: 实施者建立了一个单独的讨论小组。版本3（1996年4月至1997年6月）具有很长的规范稳定性和在六个平台上的多个实现。

contents.text: Meanwhile, the IP Security Working Group has developed a competing specification with large numbers of negotiable parameters. Also, the PPP Extensions Working Group has deployed link security transforms.
contents.zh-CHS: 与此同时，IP安全工作组开发了一个具有大量可协商参数的竞争性规范。此外，PPP扩展工作组还部署了链路安全转换。

contents.text: Version 4 (July 1997 onward) attempts to maintain a semblance of interface compatibility with these other efforts. Minor changes are
contents.zh-CHS: 版本4（1997年7月以后）试图保持与这些其他工作的接口兼容性。微小的变化是

contents.text: specified in transform padding format and key generation. More than one value is permitted per scheme, giving greater latitude in choice for future extensions. The opportunity is taken to return party privacy to the base document, and make small semantic changes in automated updates and error recovery. All ESP transform attributes are moved to separate documents, to (hopefully) avoid future incompatible changes to the base document.
contents.zh-CHS: 在转换填充格式和密钥生成中指定。每个方案允许有多个值，为将来的扩展提供了更大的选择余地。利用此机会将参与方隐私返回到基础文档，并在自动更新和错误恢复中进行小的语义更改。所有ESP transform属性都被移动到单独的文档中，以（希望）避免将来对基础文档进行不兼容的更改。

contents.text: Acknowledgements
contents.zh-CHS: 致谢

contents.text: Thou shalt make no law restricting the size of integers that may be multiplied together, nor the number of times that an integer may be multiplied by itself, nor the modulus by which an integer may be reduced. [Prime Commandment]
contents.zh-CHS: 你不应该制定法律来限制可以相乘的整数的大小，一个整数可以相乘的次数，或者一个整数可以减少的模数。[主要戒律]

contents.text: Phil Karn was principally responsible for the design of the protocol phases, particularly the "cookie" anti-clogging defense, developed the initial testing implementation, and provided much of the design rationale text (now removed to a separate document).
contents.zh-CHS: Phil Karn主要负责协议阶段的设计，特别是“cookie”防阻塞防御，开发了初始测试实现，并提供了大部分设计原理文本（现在已删除到单独的文档中）。

contents.text: William Simpson was responsible for the packet formats and attributes, additional message types, editing and formatting. All such mistakes are his responsibility.
contents.zh-CHS: William Simpson负责数据包格式和属性、附加消息类型、编辑和格式化。所有这些错误都是他的责任。

contents.text: This protocol was later discovered to have many elements in common with the Station-To-Station authentication protocol [DOW92].
contents.zh-CHS: 后来发现该协议与站对站身份验证协议有许多共同点[DOW92]。

contents.text: Angelos Keromytis developed the first completely independent implementation (circa October 1995). Also, he suggested the cookie exchange rate limitation counter.
contents.zh-CHS: Angelos Keromytis开发了第一个完全独立的实现（大约1995年10月）。此外，他还建议使用cookie汇率限制计数器。

contents.text: Paul C van Oorschot suggested signing both the public exponents and the shared-secret, to provide an authentication-only version of identity verification. Also, he provided text regarding moduli, generator, and exponent selection (now removed to a separate document).
contents.zh-CHS: Paul C van Oorschot建议同时签署公开声明和共享秘密，以提供身份验证的仅认证版本。此外，他还提供了有关模数、生成器和指数选择的文本（现在已删除到单独的文档中）。

contents.text: Hilarie Orman suggested adding secret "nonces" to session-key generation for asymmetric public/private-key identity methods (now removed to a separate document), and provided extensive review of the protocol details.
contents.zh-CHS: Hilarie Orman建议为非对称公钥/私钥标识方法的会话密钥生成添加秘密“nonce”（现已删除到单独的文档中），并对协议细节进行了广泛的审查。

contents.text: Bart Preneel and Paul C van Oorschot in [PO96] recommended padding between the data and trailing key when hashing for authentication.
contents.zh-CHS: Bart Preneel和Paul C van Oorschot在[PO96]中建议在对身份验证进行散列时，在数据和尾随密钥之间进行填充。

contents.text: Niels Provos developed another independent implementation (circa May 1997), ported to AIX, Linux, OpenBSD, and Solaris. Also, he made
contents.zh-CHS: Niels Provos开发了另一个独立的实现（大约1997年5月），移植到AIX、Linux、OpenBSD和Solaris。他还做了

contents.text: suggestions regarding automated update, and listing multiple moduli per scheme.
contents.zh-CHS: 关于自动更新的建议，并列出每个方案的多个模块。

contents.text: Bill Sommerfeld suggested including the authentication symmetric secret-keys in the session-key generation, and using the Cookie values on successive exchanges to provide bi-directional user-oriented keying (now removed to a separate document).
contents.zh-CHS: Bill Sommerfeld建议在会话密钥生成中包含身份验证对称密钥，并在连续交换中使用Cookie值来提供面向用户的双向密钥（现在已删除到单独的文档中）。

contents.text: Oliver Spatscheck developed the second independent implementation (circa December 1995) for the Xkernel.
contents.zh-CHS: Oliver Spatscheck为Xkernel开发了第二个独立实现（大约1995年12月）。

contents.text: International interoperability testing between early implementors provided the impetus for many of the implementation notes herein, and numerous refinements in the semantics of the protocol messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 早期实现者之间的国际互操作性测试为本文中的许多实现说明以及协议消息语义的许多改进提供了动力。

contents.text: Randall Atkinson, Steven Bellovin, Wataru Hamada, James Hughes, Brian LaMacchia, Cheryl Madson, Lewis McCarthy, Perry Metzger, Bob Quinn, Ron Rivest, Rich Schroeppel, and Norman Shulman provided useful critiques of earlier versions of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: Randall Atkinson、Steven Bellovin、Wataru Hamada、James Hughes、Brian LaMacchia、Cheryl Madson、Lewis McCarthy、Perry Metzger、Bob Quinn、Ron Rivest、Rich Schroeppel和Norman Shulman对本文件的早期版本提出了有益的评论。

contents.text: Special thanks to the Center for Information Technology Integration (CITI) for providing computing resources.
contents.zh-CHS: 特别感谢信息技术集成中心（CITI）提供的计算资源。
